</div>
<p style=
"margin:0pt;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;font-size: 10pt;">
<font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;color:#0563C1;">
<font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;">&nbsp;</font></font></p>
<p style=
"margin:0pt 0pt 12pt;color:#000000;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;font-size: 10pt;">
<font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;color:#0563C1;">
<font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;font-weight:bold;color:#000000;">
Deferred Acquisition Liability</font></font></p>
<p style=
"margin:0pt 0pt 12pt;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;font-size: 10pt;">
<font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;color:#0563C1;">
<font style="display:inline;">The Company has a deferred
acquisition liability related to an acquisition that occurred in
2013.&nbsp;&nbsp;The liability is denominated in Euros and requires
annual payments based on a percentage of gross profit from the
sales of certain products, and any amounts not repaid by the annual
payments will be due in June 2018.&nbsp;&nbsp;The current balance
recorded as of March 31, 2018, and December 31, 2017 was $1,622
thousand and $1,575 thousand, respectively, and is included in
other accrued expenses on the condensed consolidated balance
sheets.&nbsp;</font></font></p>
<p style=
"margin:0pt 0pt 12pt;color:#000000;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;font-size: 10pt;">
<font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;color:#0563C1;">
<font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;font-weight:bold;color:#000000;">
Revenue Recognition</font></font></p>
<p style=
"margin:0pt 0pt 12pt;color:#000000;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;font-size: 10pt;">
<font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;color:#0563C1;">
<font style=
"display:inline;color:#000000;background-color: #FFFFFF;">On
January 1, 2018, we adopted Asscounting Standards Update (“ASU”)
No. 2014-09,</font><font style=
"display:inline;font-style:italic;color:#000000;background-color: #FFFFFF;">&nbsp;Revenue
from Contracts with Customers</font><font style=
"display:inline;color:#000000;background-color: #FFFFFF;">&nbsp;(
“Topic 606”) using the modified retrospective method. See below
under Adopted Accounting Standard Updates for additional
information.&nbsp;&nbsp;As a result of the adoption of Topic 606,
we have updated our accounting policy for revenue recognition as
follows:</font></font></p>
<p style=
"margin:0pt;background-color: #FFFFFF;border-bottom:1pt none #D9D9D9 ;color:#000000;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;font-size: 10pt;">
<font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;color:#0563C1;">
<font style="display:inline;font-style:italic;color:#000000;">When
Performance Obligations Are Satisfied</font></font></p>
<p style=
"margin:0pt;background-color: #FFFFFF;border-top:1pt none #D9D9D9 ;border-bottom:1pt none #D9D9D9 ;color:#000000;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;font-size: 10pt;">
<font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;color:#0563C1;">
<font style=
"display:inline;color:#000000;">&nbsp;</font></font></p>
<p style=
"margin:0pt;background-color: #FFFFFF;border-top:1pt none #D9D9D9 ;border-bottom:1pt none #D9D9D9 ;color:#000000;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;font-size: 10pt;">
<font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;color:#0563C1;">
<font style="display:inline;color:#000000;">A performance
obligation is a promise in a contract to transfer a distinct good
or service to the customer and is the unit of account for revenue
recognition.&nbsp;&nbsp;A contract’s transaction price is allocated
to each distinct performance obligation and recognized as revenue
when, or as, the performance obligation is
satisfied.&nbsp;&nbsp;The Company’s performance obligations are
product sales and the delivery of veterinary
services.</font><font style=
"display:inline;color:#595959;font-size:9pt;background-color: #FFFFFF;">&nbsp;</font></font></p>
<p style=
"margin:0pt;background-color: #FFFFFF;border-top:1pt none #D9D9D9 ;border-bottom:1pt none #D9D9D9 ;color:#000000;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;font-size: 10pt;">
<font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;color:#0563C1;">
<font style=
"display:inline;color:#000000;">&nbsp;</font></font></p>
<p style=
"margin:0pt;background-color: #FFFFFF;border-top:1pt none #D9D9D9 ;border-bottom:1pt none #D9D9D9 ;color:#595959;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;font-size: 10pt;">
<font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;color:#0563C1;">
<font style="display:inline;color:#000000;">Revenue is recognized
for product sales on a point in time basis when product control is
transferred to the customer.&nbsp;&nbsp;In general, control
transfers to the customer when the product is shipped or delivered
to the customer based upon applicable shipping terms, as the
customer can direct the use and obtain substantially all of the
remaining benefits from the asset at this point in
time.&nbsp;&nbsp;</font><font style=
"display:inline;color:#595959;font-size:9pt;background-color: #FFFFFF;">&nbsp;</font></font></p>
<p style=
"margin:0pt;background-color: #FFFFFF;border-top:1pt none #D9D9D9 ;color:#595959;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;font-size: 9pt;">
<font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;color:#0563C1;">
<font style=
"display:inline;font-size:9pt;">&nbsp;</font></font></p>
<p style=
"margin:0pt;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;font-size: 10pt;">
</p>
</div>
<div style=
"margin-left:10.2941176470588%;margin-right:10.2941176470588%;">
<div style="width:100%">
<p style=
"margin:24pt 0pt 0pt;text-align:center;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;font-size: 10pt;">
<font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;color:#0563C1;">
<font style="display:inline;">12</font></font></p>
</div>
</div>
<div style=
"margin-left:10.2941176470588%;margin-right:10.2941176470588%;">
<hr align="center" style=
'background-color:#000000; border-width:0; color:#000000; height:2pt; lineheight:0; width:100%;' />

<p style="page-break-after:always"><font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;color:#0563C1;">
&nbsp;</font></p>
</div>
<div style=
"margin-left:10.2941176470588%;margin-right:10.2941176470588%;">
<div style="width:100%">
<p style=
"margin:0pt 0pt 30pt;color:#0563C1;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;font-size: 10pt;">
<font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;color:#0563C1;">
<a href="#TOC"><font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;color:#0563C1;">
Table of Contents</font></a></font></p>
</div>
</div>
<div style=
"margin-left:10.2941176470588%;margin-right:10.2941176470588%;">
<p style=
"margin:0pt;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;font-size: 10pt;">
</p>
<p style=
"margin:0pt;background-color: #FFFFFF;border-bottom:1pt none #D9D9D9 ;color:#000000;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;font-size: 10pt;">
<font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;color:#0563C1;">
<font style="display:inline;color:#000000;">Revenue is recognized
for services over time when the service is
delivered.&nbsp;</font></font></p>
<p style=
"margin:0pt;background-color: #FFFFFF;border-top:1pt none #D9D9D9 ;border-bottom:1pt none #D9D9D9 ;color:#000000;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;font-size: 11pt;">
<font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;color:#0563C1;">
<font style=
"display:inline;color:#000000;font-size:11pt;">&nbsp;</font></font></p>
<p style=
"margin:0pt;background-color: #FFFFFF;border-top:1pt none #D9D9D9 ;border-bottom:1pt none #D9D9D9 ;color:#000000;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;font-size: 10pt;">
<font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;color:#0563C1;">
<font style="display:inline;color:#000000;">Customer contracts
generally do not include more than one performance
obligation.&nbsp;&nbsp;When a contract does contain more than one
performance obligation, we allocate the contract’s transaction
price to each performance obligation based on its relative
standalone selling price.&nbsp;&nbsp;The standalone selling price
for each distinct good is generally determined by directly
observable data.&nbsp;&nbsp;</font><font style=
"display:inline;color:#595959;font-size:9pt;background-color: #FFFFFF;">&nbsp;</font></font></p>
<p style=
"margin:0pt;background-color: #FFFFFF;border-top:1pt none #D9D9D9 ;border-bottom:1pt none #D9D9D9 ;color:#000000;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;font-size: 10pt;">
<font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;color:#0563C1;">
<font style=
"display:inline;color:#000000;">&nbsp;</font></font></p>
<p style=
"margin:0pt;background-color: #FFFFFF;border-top:1pt none #D9D9D9 ;border-bottom:1pt none #D9D9D9 ;color:#000000;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;font-size: 10pt;">
<font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;color:#0563C1;">
<font style="display:inline;color:#000000;">The performance
obligations in our contracts are satisfied within one year. As
such, we have not disclosed the transaction price allocated to
remaining performance obligations as of March 31,
2018.</font></font></p>
<p style=
"margin:0pt;background-color: #FFFFFF;border-top:1pt none #D9D9D9 ;border-bottom:1pt none #D9D9D9 ;color:#000000;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;font-size: 10pt;">
<font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;color:#0563C1;">
<font style=
"display:inline;color:#000000;">&nbsp;</font></font></p>
<p style=
"margin:0pt;background-color: #FFFFFF;border-top:1pt none #D9D9D9 ;border-bottom:1pt none #D9D9D9 ;color:#000000;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;font-size: 10pt;">
<font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;color:#0563C1;">
<font style=
"display:inline;font-style:italic;color:#000000;">Significant
Payment Terms</font></font></p>
<p style=
"margin:0pt;background-color: #FFFFFF;border-top:1pt none #D9D9D9 ;border-bottom:1pt none #D9D9D9 ;color:#000000;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;font-size: 10pt;">
<font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;color:#0563C1;">
<font style=
"display:inline;color:#000000;">&nbsp;</font></font></p>
<p style=
"margin:0pt;background-color: #FFFFFF;border-top:1pt none #D9D9D9 ;border-bottom:1pt none #D9D9D9 ;color:#000000;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;font-size: 10pt;">
<font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;color:#0563C1;">
<font style="display:inline;color:#000000;">Our customer contracts
identify the product, quantity, price, payment and final delivery
terms.&nbsp;&nbsp;Payment terms usually include early pay
discounts.&nbsp;&nbsp;We grant payment terms consistent with
industry standards. Although some payment terms may be more
extended, no terms beyond one year are granted at contract
inception.&nbsp;&nbsp;As a result, we do not adjust the promised
amount of consideration for the effects of a significant financing
component because the period between our transfer of a promised
good or service to a customer and the customer’s payment for that
good or service will be one year or less.</font></font></p>
<p style=
"margin:0pt;background-color: #FFFFFF;border-top:1pt none #D9D9D9 ;border-bottom:1pt none #D9D9D9 ;color:#000000;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;font-size: 10pt;">
<font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;color:#0563C1;">
<font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;">&nbsp;</font></font></p>
<p style=
"margin:0pt;background-color: #FFFFFF;border-top:1pt none #D9D9D9 ;border-bottom:1pt none #D9D9D9 ;color:#000000;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;font-size: 10pt;">
<font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;color:#0563C1;">
<font style=
"display:inline;font-style:italic;color:#000000;">Shipping</font></font></p>
<p style=
"margin:0pt;background-color: #FFFFFF;border-top:1pt none #D9D9D9 ;border-bottom:1pt none #D9D9D9 ;color:#000000;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;font-size: 10pt;">
<font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;color:#0563C1;">
<font style=
"display:inline;color:#000000;">&nbsp;</font></font></p>
<p style=
"margin:0pt;background-color: #FFFFFF;border-top:1pt none #D9D9D9 ;border-bottom:1pt none #D9D9D9 ;color:#000000;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;font-size: 10pt;">
<font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;color:#0563C1;">
<font style="display:inline;color:#000000;">All shipping and
handling costs associated with outbound freight are accounted for
as fulfillment costs and are in included in the cost of sales; this
includes shipping and handling costs after control over a product
has transferred to a customer.</font><font style=
"display:inline;color:#595959;font-size:9pt;background-color: #FFFFFF;">&nbsp;</font></font></p>
<p style=
"margin:0pt;background-color: #FFFFFF;border-top:1pt none #D9D9D9 ;border-bottom:1pt none #D9D9D9 ;color:#000000;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;font-size: 10pt;">
<font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;color:#0563C1;">
<font style=
"display:inline;color:#000000;">&nbsp;</font></font></p>
<p style=
"margin:0pt;background-color: #FFFFFF;border-top:1pt none #D9D9D9 ;border-bottom:1pt none #D9D9D9 ;color:#000000;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;font-size: 10pt;">
<font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;color:#0563C1;">
<font style=
"display:inline;font-style:italic;color:#000000;">Variable
Consideration</font></font></p>
<p style=
"margin:0pt;background-color: #FFFFFF;border-top:1pt none #D9D9D9 ;border-bottom:1pt none #D9D9D9 ;color:#000000;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;font-size: 10pt;">
<font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;color:#0563C1;">
<font style=
"display:inline;color:#000000;">&nbsp;</font></font></p>
<p style=
"margin:0pt;background-color: #FFFFFF;border-top:1pt none #D9D9D9 ;border-bottom:1pt none #D9D9D9 ;color:#595959;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;font-size: 10pt;">
<font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;color:#0563C1;">
<font style="display:inline;color:#000000;">In addition to fixed
contract consideration, most contracts include some form of
variable consideration.&nbsp;&nbsp;The most common forms of
variable consideration include discounts, rebates and sales returns
and allowances.&nbsp;&nbsp;Variable consideration is treated as a
reduction in revenue when product revenue is
recognized.&nbsp;&nbsp;Depending on the specific type of variable
consideration, we use either the expected value or most likely
amount method to determine the variable
consideration.&nbsp;&nbsp;We believe there will not be significant
changes to our estimates of variable consideration when any related
uncertainties are resolved with our customers.&nbsp;&nbsp;The
Company reviews and updates its estimates and related accruals of
variable consideration each period based on the terms of the
agreements, historical experience, and any recent changes in the
market.&nbsp;&nbsp;Any uncertainties in the ultimate resolution of
variable consideration due to factors outside of the Company’s
influence are typically resolved within a short timeframe therefore
not requiring any additional constraint on the variable
consideration.&nbsp;&nbsp;</font><font style=
"display:inline;color:#595959;font-size:9pt;background-color: #FFFFFF;">&nbsp;</font></font></p>
<p style=
"margin:0pt;background-color: #FFFFFF;border-top:1pt none #D9D9D9 ;color:#595959;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;font-size: 9pt;">
<font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;color:#0563C1;">
<font style=
"display:inline;font-size:9pt;">&nbsp;</font></font></p>
<p style=
"margin:0pt;background-color: #FFFFFF;line-height:normal;text-align:justify;text-justify:inter-ideograph;color:#000000;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;font-size: 10pt;">
<font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;color:#0563C1;">
<font style=
"display:inline;font-family:inherit;color:#000000;">Trade marketing
expense, consisting primarily of customer pricing allowances and
merchandising funds are offered through various programs to
customers and are designed to promote our products. They include
the cost of in-store product displays, feature pricing in
retailers' advertisements and other temporary price reductions.
These programs are offered to our customers both in fixed and
variable (rate per case) amounts. The ultimate cost of these
programs depends on retailer performance and is the subject of
management estimates.</font></font></p>
<p style=
"margin:0pt;background-color: #FFFFFF;line-height:normal;text-align:justify;text-justify:inter-ideograph;color:#000000;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;font-size: 10pt;">
<font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;color:#0563C1;">
<font style="display:inline;">&nbsp;</font></font></p>
<p style=
"margin:0pt;background-color: #FFFFFF;line-height:normal;text-align:justify;text-justify:inter-ideograph;color:#000000;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;font-size: 10pt;">
<font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;color:#0563C1;">
<font style=
"display:inline;font-family:inherit;color:#000000;">Certain
retailers require the payment of product introductory fees in order
to obtain space for the Company's products on the retailer's store
shelves. This cost is typically a lump sum and is determined using
the expected value based on the contract between the two
parties.</font></font></p>
<p style=
"margin:0pt;background-color: #FFFFFF;line-height:normal;text-align:justify;text-justify:inter-ideograph;color:#000000;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;font-size: 10pt;">
<font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;color:#0563C1;">
<font style="display:inline;">&nbsp;</font></font></p>
<p style=
"margin:0pt;background-color: #FFFFFF;line-height:normal;text-align:justify;text-justify:inter-ideograph;color:#000000;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;font-size: 10pt;">
<font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;color:#0563C1;">
<font style=
"display:inline;font-family:inherit;color:#000000;">Both trade
marketing expense and product introductory fees are recognized as
reductions of revenue at the time the transfer of control of the
associated products occurs. Accruals for expected payouts under
these programs are included as other current assets or other
current liabilities in the Condensed Consolidated Balance
Sheet.</font></font></p>
<p style=
"margin:0pt;background-color: #FFFFFF;color:#000000;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;font-size: 10pt;">
<font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;color:#0563C1;">
<font style=
"display:inline;color:#000000;">&nbsp;</font></font></p>
<p style=
"margin:0pt;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;font-size: 10pt;">
</p>
</div>
<div style=
"margin-left:10.2941176470588%;margin-right:10.2941176470588%;">
<div style="width:100%">
<p style=
"margin:24pt 0pt 0pt;text-align:center;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;font-size: 10pt;">
<font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;color:#0563C1;">
<font style="display:inline;">13</font></font></p>
</div>
</div>
<div style=
"margin-left:10.2941176470588%;margin-right:10.2941176470588%;">
<hr align="center" style=
'background-color:#000000; border-width:0; color:#000000; height:2pt; lineheight:0; width:100%;' />

<p style="page-break-after:always"><font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;color:#0563C1;">
&nbsp;</font></p>
</div>
<div style=
"margin-left:10.2941176470588%;margin-right:10.2941176470588%;">
<div style="width:100%">
<p style=
"margin:0pt 0pt 30pt;color:#0563C1;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;font-size: 10pt;">
<font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;color:#0563C1;">
<a href="#TOC"><font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;color:#0563C1;">
Table of Contents</font></a></font></p>
</div>
</div>
<div style=
"margin-left:10.2941176470588%;margin-right:10.2941176470588%;">
<p style=
"margin:0pt;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;font-size: 10pt;">
</p>
<p style=
"margin:0pt;background-color: #FFFFFF;border-bottom:1pt none #D9D9D9 ;color:#000000;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;font-size: 10pt;">
<font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;color:#0563C1;">
<font style=
"display:inline;font-style:italic;color:#000000;">Warranties &amp;
Returns</font></font></p>
<p style=
"margin:0pt;background-color: #FFFFFF;border-top:1pt none #D9D9D9 ;border-bottom:1pt none #D9D9D9 ;color:#000000;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;font-size: 10pt;">
<font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;color:#0563C1;">
<font style=
"display:inline;color:#000000;">&nbsp;</font></font></p>
<p style=
"margin:0pt;background-color: #FFFFFF;border-top:1pt none #D9D9D9 ;border-bottom:1pt none #D9D9D9 ;color:#000000;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;font-size: 10pt;">
<font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;color:#0563C1;">
<font style="display:inline;color:#000000;">PetIQ provides all
customers with a standard or assurance type
warranty.&nbsp;&nbsp;Either stated or implied, the Company provides
assurance the related products will comply with all agreed-upon
specifications and other warranties provided under the
law.&nbsp;&nbsp; No significant services beyond an assurance
warranty are provided to customers.&nbsp;</font></font></p>
<p style=
"margin:0pt;background-color: #FFFFFF;border-top:1pt none #D9D9D9 ;border-bottom:1pt none #D9D9D9 ;color:#000000;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;font-size: 10pt;">
<font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;color:#0563C1;">
<font style=
"display:inline;color:#000000;">&nbsp;</font></font></p>
<p style=
"margin:0pt;background-color: #FFFFFF;border-top:1pt none #D9D9D9 ;border-bottom:1pt none #D9D9D9 ;color:#000000;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;font-size: 10pt;">
<font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;color:#0563C1;">
<font style="display:inline;color:#000000;">The Company does not
grant a general right of return.&nbsp;&nbsp;However, customers may
return defective or non-conforming products.&nbsp;&nbsp;Customer
remedies may include either a cash refund or an exchange of the
product.&nbsp;&nbsp;As a result, the right of return and related
refund liability is estimated and recorded as a reduction in
revenue.&nbsp;&nbsp;This return estimate is reviewed and updated
each period and is based on historical sales and return
experience.&nbsp;</font></font></p>
<p style=
"margin:0pt;background-color: #FFFFFF;border-top:1pt none #D9D9D9 ;border-bottom:1pt none #D9D9D9 ;color:#000000;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;font-size: 10pt;">
<font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;color:#0563C1;">
<font style=
"display:inline;color:#000000;">&nbsp;</font></font></p>
<p style=
"margin:0pt;background-color: #FFFFFF;border-top:1pt none #D9D9D9 ;border-bottom:1pt none #D9D9D9 ;color:#000000;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;font-size: 10pt;">
<font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;color:#0563C1;">
<font style=
"display:inline;font-style:italic;color:#000000;">Contract
balances</font></font></p>
<p style=
"margin:0pt;background-color: #FFFFFF;border-top:1pt none #D9D9D9 ;border-bottom:1pt none #D9D9D9 ;color:#000000;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;font-size: 10pt;">
<font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;color:#0563C1;">
<font style=
"display:inline;color:#000000;">&nbsp;</font></font></p>
<p style=
"margin:0pt;background-color: #FFFFFF;border-top:1pt none #D9D9D9 ;border-bottom:1pt none #D9D9D9 ;color:#000000;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;font-size: 10pt;">
<font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;color:#0563C1;">
<font style="display:inline;color:#000000;">Contract asset and
liability balances as of March 31, 2018 are
immaterial.&nbsp;&nbsp;The Company does not have significant
deferred revenue or unbilled receivable balances because of
transactions with customers.</font></font></p>
<p style=
"margin:0pt;background-color: #FFFFFF;border-top:1pt none #D9D9D9 ;color:#000000;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;font-size: 10pt;">
<font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;color:#0563C1;">
<font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;">&nbsp;</font></font></p>
<p style=
"margin:0pt 0pt 12pt;color:#000000;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;font-size: 10pt;">
<font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;color:#0563C1;">
<font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;font-weight:bold;color:#000000;">
Cost of Services</font></font></p>
<p style=
"margin:0pt 0pt 11pt;background-color: #FFFFFF;text-align:justify;text-justify:inter-ideograph;color:#000000;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;font-size: 10pt;">
<font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;color:#0563C1;">
<font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;color:#000000;">
Cost of Services are comprised of all service and product costs
related to provide veterinary services to consumers, including but
not limited to, salaries of veterinarians, technicians and other
clinic based personnel, transportation and delivery costs,
facilities rent, occupancy costs, supply costs, depreciation and
amortization of clinic assets, certain marketing and promotional
expenses and costs of goods sold.</font></font></p>
<p style=
"margin:0pt 0pt 12pt;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;font-size: 10pt;">
<font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;color:#0563C1;">
<font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;font-weight:bold;">
Research and Development and Advertising Costs</font></font></p>
<p style=
"margin:0pt 0pt 12pt;color:#000000;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;font-size: 10pt;">
<font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;color:#0563C1;">
<font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;color:#000000;">
Research and development and advertising costs are expensed as
incurred and are included in general and administrative expenses.
Research and development costs amounted to $49 thousand and $195
thousand for the three months ended March 31, 2018 and 2017,
respectively.&nbsp;&nbsp;Advertising costs were $594 thousand and
$458 thousand for the three months ended March 31, 2018 and 2017,
respectively.</font></font></p>
<p style=
"margin:0pt 0pt 12pt;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;font-size: 10pt;">
<font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;color:#0563C1;">
<font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;font-weight:bold;">
Income taxes</font></font></p>
<p style=
"margin:0pt;color:#000000;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;font-size: 10pt;">
<font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;color:#0563C1;">
<font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;color:#000000;">
The Company records a tax provision for the anticipated tax
consequences of the reported results of operations. The provision
for income taxes is computed using the asset and liability method,
under which deferred tax assets and liabilities are recognized for
the expected future tax consequences of temporary differences
between the financial reporting and tax basis of assets and
liabilities, and for operating losses and tax credit carryforwards.
Deferred tax assets and liabilities are measured using the
currently enacted tax rates that apply to taxable income in effect
for the years in which those tax assets are expected to be realized
or settled. The Company may record a valuation allowance, if
conditions are applicable, to reduce deferred tax assets to the
amount that is believed more likely than not to be
realized.</font></font></p>
<p style=
"margin:0pt;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;font-size: 10pt;">
<font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;color:#0563C1;">
<font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;">&nbsp;</font></font></p>
<p style=
"margin:0pt 0pt 12pt;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;font-size: 10pt;">
<font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;color:#0563C1;">
<font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;font-weight:bold;">
Non-controlling interest</font></font></p>
<p style=
"margin:0pt 0pt 12pt;color:#000000;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;font-size: 11pt;">
<font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;color:#0563C1;">
<font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;color:#000000;">
The non-controlling interests on the condensed consolidated
statements of income represents the portion of earnings or loss
attributable to the economic interest in the Company’s subsidiary,
PetIQ Holdings, LLC, held by the non-controlling Continuing LLC
Owners. Non-controlling interests on the condensed consolidated
balance sheet represents the portion of net assets of the Company
attributable to the non-controlling Continuing LLC Owners, based on
the portion of the LLC Interests owned by such LLC interest
holders. There was no significant non-controlling interest for the
three months ended March 31, 2017 or the remaining period prior to
the IPO on July 20, 2017 because the Company operated as Opco
during those periods. As of March 31, 2018 and December 31, 2017
the non-controlling interest was approximately 37.2% and
38.5%,</font> <font style=
"display:inline;font-size:11pt;">respectively</font><font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;color:#000000;">.
&nbsp;</font></font></p>
<p style=
"margin:0pt;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;font-size: 10pt;">
</p>
</div>
<div style=
"margin-left:10.2941176470588%;margin-right:10.2941176470588%;">
<div style="width:100%">
<p style=
"margin:24pt 0pt 0pt;text-align:center;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;font-size: 10pt;">
<font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;color:#0563C1;">
<font style="display:inline;">14</font></font></p>
</div>
</div>
<div style=
"margin-left:10.2941176470588%;margin-right:10.2941176470588%;">
<hr align="center" style=
'background-color:#000000; border-width:0; color:#000000; height:2pt; lineheight:0; width:100%;' />

<p style="page-break-after:always"><font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;color:#0563C1;">
&nbsp;</font></p>
</div>
<div style=
"margin-left:10.2941176470588%;margin-right:10.2941176470588%;">
<div style="width:100%">
<p style=
"margin:0pt 0pt 30pt;color:#0563C1;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;font-size: 10pt;">
<font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;color:#0563C1;">
<a href="#TOC"><font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;color:#0563C1;">
Table of Contents</font></a></font></p>
</div>
</div>
<div style=
"margin-left:10.2941176470588%;margin-right:10.2941176470588%;">
<p style=
"margin:0pt;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;font-size: 10pt;">
</p>
<p style=
"margin:0pt 0pt 12pt;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;font-size: 10pt;">
<font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;color:#0563C1;">
<font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;font-weight:bold;">
Litigation</font></font></p>
<p style=
"margin:0pt 0pt 12pt;color:#000000;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;font-size: 10pt;">
<font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;color:#0563C1;">
<font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;color:#000000;">
The Company is subject to various legal proceedings, claims,
litigation, investigations and contingencies arising out of the
ordinary course of business. If the likelihood of an adverse legal
outcome is determined to be probable and the amount of loss is
estimable, then a liability is accrued in accordance with
accounting guidance for contingencies.&nbsp;&nbsp;The company
consults with both internal and external legal counsel related to
litigation.</font></font></p>
<p style=
"margin:0pt 0pt 12pt;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;font-size: 10pt;">
<font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;color:#0563C1;">
<font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;font-weight:bold;">
Reclassifications</font></font></p>
<p style=
"margin:2pt 0pt 0pt;text-align:justify;text-justify:inter-ideograph;color:#000000;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;font-size: 10pt;">
<font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;color:#0563C1;">
<font style="display:inline;color:#000000;">Certain
reclassifications have been made to the prior years’ consolidated
financial statemetns to conform to current year
presentation.&nbsp;&nbsp;These reclassifications had no impact on
net income, shareholders’ equity, or cash flows as previously
reported.</font></font></p>
<p style=
"margin:0pt;text-align:justify;text-justify:inter-ideograph;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;font-size: 10pt;">
<font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;color:#0563C1;">
<font style="display:inline;">&nbsp;</font></font></p>
<p style=
"margin:0pt;text-align:justify;text-justify:inter-ideograph;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;font-size: 10pt;">
<font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;color:#0563C1;">
<font style=
"display:inline;font-weight:bold;font-style:italic;">Adopted
Accounting Standard Updates</font></font></p>
<p style=
"margin:0pt;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;font-size: 12pt;">
<font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;color:#0563C1;">
<font style=
"display:inline;font-size:12pt;">&nbsp;</font></font></p>
<p style=
"margin:0pt;text-align:justify;text-justify:inter-ideograph;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;font-size: 10pt;">
<font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;color:#0563C1;">
<font style="display:inline;font-style:italic;">ASU 2014-09,
Revenue from Contracts with Customers (Topic 606)</font></font></p>
<p style=
"margin:0pt;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;font-size: 12pt;">
<font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;color:#0563C1;">
<font style=
"display:inline;font-size:12pt;">&nbsp;</font></font></p>
<p style=
"margin:0pt;text-align:justify;text-justify:inter-ideograph;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;font-size: 10pt;">
<font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;color:#0563C1;">
<font style="display:inline;">On January 1, 2018, the Company
adopted Topic 606 using the modified retrospective approach.&nbsp;
Under the modified retrospective approach, the Company is required
to recognize the cumulative effect of initially applying Topic 606
as an adjustment to the opening balance of retained earnings as of
January 1, 2018, the date of initial application.&nbsp; The
cumulative effect of initially applying Topic 606 was immaterial to
the Condensed Consolidated Financial Statements.</font></font></p>
<p style=
"margin:0pt;text-align:justify;text-justify:inter-ideograph;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;font-size: 10pt;">
<font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;color:#0563C1;">
<font style="display:inline;">&nbsp;</font></font></p>
<p style=
"margin:0pt;text-align:justify;text-justify:inter-ideograph;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;font-size: 10pt;">
<font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;color:#0563C1;">
<font style="display:inline;">In conjunction with adoption of Topic
606, the Company updated its significant accounting policy related
to revenue recognition.&nbsp;&nbsp;The Company’s previous revenue
recogniation policy was disclosed in Note 1 “Summary of Significant
Accounting Policies” of the Consolidated Financial Statements in
the Company’s Annual Report on Form 10-K for the year ended
December 31, 2017.</font></font></p>
<p style=
"margin:0pt;background-color: #FFFFFF;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;font-size: 12pt;">
<font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;color:#0563C1;">
<font style=
"display:inline;font-size:12pt;">&nbsp;</font></font></p>
<p style=
"margin:0pt;background-color: #FFFFFF;text-align:justify;text-justify:inter-ideograph;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;font-size: 10pt;">
<font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;color:#0563C1;">
<font style="display:inline;">Results for the three month period
ended March 31, 2018 is presented under Topic 606.&nbsp; Prior
periods are not adjusted and will continue to be reported in
accordance with ASC 605</font> <font style=
"display:inline;font-style:italic;">Revenue Recognition</font>
<font style="display:inline;">(“ASC 605”).&nbsp;&nbsp;The following
tables summarize the impacts of adopting Topic 606 on the Company’s
Condensed Consolidated Financial Statements as of and for the three
month period ended March 31, 2018.</font></font></p>
<p style=
"margin:0pt;background-color: #FFFFFF;text-align:justify;text-justify:inter-ideograph;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;font-size: 10pt;">
<font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;color:#0563C1;">
<font style="display:inline;">&nbsp;</font></font></p>
<p style=
"margin:0pt;background-color: #FFFFFF;text-align:justify;text-justify:inter-ideograph;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;font-size: 10pt;">
<font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;color:#0563C1;">
<font style="display:inline;font-weight:bold;">Condensed
Consolidated Statements of Operations</font></font></p>
<p style=
"margin:0pt;text-align:justify;text-justify:inter-ideograph;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;font-size: 10pt;">
<font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;color:#0563C1;">
<font style="display:inline;">&nbsp;</font></font></p>

866</font></p>

</div>
<p style=
"margin:0pt;border-bottom:1pt none #D9D9D9 ;color:#000000;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;font-size: 1pt;">
<font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;color:#0563C1;">
<font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;font-size:1pt;">
&nbsp;</font></font></p>
<p style=
"margin:0pt;border-top:1pt none #D9D9D9 ;color:#000000;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;font-size: 10pt;">
<font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;color:#0563C1;">
<font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;">&nbsp;</font></font></p>
<p style=
"margin:0pt 0pt 12pt;color:#000000;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;font-size: 10pt;">
<font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;color:#0563C1;">
<font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;font-weight:bold;color:#000000;">
Recently Issued Accounting Pronouncements</font></font></p>
<p style=
"margin:0pt 0pt 12pt;border-bottom:1pt none #D9D9D9 ;color:#000000;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;font-size: 10pt;">
<font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;color:#0563C1;">
<font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;color:#000000;">
In February 2016, the FASB issued ASU 2016-02, Leases. This ASU is
a comprehensive new lease standard that was issued to increase
transparency and comparability among organizations by recognizing
lease assets and lease liabilities on the balance sheet and
disclosing key information about leasing
arrangements.&nbsp;&nbsp;The amendments in this ASU are effective
for fiscal years beginning after December 15, 2018, including
interim periods within those fiscal years. This standard requires
adoption based upon a modified retrospective transition approach
for leases existing at, or entered into after, the beginning of the
earliest comparative period presented in the financial statements,
with optional practical expedients.&nbsp;&nbsp; Based on a
preliminary assessment, the Company expects that most of its
operating lease commitments will be subject to the new guidance and
recognized as operating lease liabilities and right-of-use assets
upon adoption, resulting in an increase in the assets and
liabilities on our consolidated balance sheet.&nbsp; The Company is
continuing its assessment, which may identify additional impacts
this standard will have on its consolidated financial statements
and related disclosures.</font></font></p>
<p style=
"margin:0pt;border-top:1pt none #D9D9D9 ;border-bottom:1pt none #D9D9D9 ;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;font-size: 10pt;">
<font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;color:#0563C1;">
<font style="display:inline;">In March&nbsp;2018, the FASB
issued&nbsp;ASU&nbsp;No.&nbsp;2018-05</font><font style=
"display:inline;background-color: #FFFFFF;">,&nbsp;</font><font style="display:inline;font-style:italic;background-color: #FFFFFF;">Income
Taxes (Topic 740), Amendments to SEC Paragraphs Pursuant to SEC
Staff Accounting Bulletin No.&nbsp;118</font><font style=
"display:inline;background-color: #FFFFFF;">. The amendments add
various SEC paragraphs pursuant to the issuance of SEC Accounting
Bulletin No. 118,&nbsp;</font><font style=
"display:inline;font-style:italic;background-color: #FFFFFF;">Income
Tax Accounting Implications of the Tax Cuts and Jobs
Act</font><font style=
"display:inline;background-color: #FFFFFF;">&nbsp;(“Act”) (“SAB 118”
). The SEC issued SAB 118 to address concerns about
reporting&nbsp;entities’ ability to timely comply with the
accounting requirements to recognize all of the effects of the Act
in the period of enactment. SAB 118 allows disclosure that timely
determination of some or all of the income tax effects from the Act
are incomplete by the due date of the financial statements and if
possible to provide a reasonable estimate. The Company has provided
a reasonable estimate in the notes to the condensed consolidated
financial statements.</font></font></p>
<p style=
"margin:0pt;border-top:1pt none #D9D9D9 ;border-bottom:1pt none #D9D9D9 ;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;font-size: 1pt;">
<font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;color:#0563C1;">
<font style=
"display:inline;font-size:1pt;">&nbsp;</font></font></p>
<p style=
"margin:0pt;border-top:1pt none #D9D9D9 ;border-bottom:1pt none #D9D9D9 ;color:#000000;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;font-size: 10pt;">
<font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;color:#0563C1;">
<font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;">&nbsp;</font></font></p>
<p style=
"margin:0pt;border-top:1pt none #D9D9D9 ;border-bottom:1pt none #D9D9D9 ;color:#000000;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;font-size: 10pt;">
<font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;color:#0563C1;">
<font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;font-weight:bold;color:#000000;">
Note 2 – Business Combination</font></font></p>
<p style=
"margin:0pt;border-top:1pt none #D9D9D9 ;color:#000000;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;font-size: 10pt;">
<font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;color:#0563C1;">
<font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;">&nbsp;</font></font></p>
<p style=
"margin:0pt;color:#00100B;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;font-size: 10pt;">
<font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;color:#0563C1;">
<font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;color:#000000;">
On January 17, 2018</font> <font style=
"display:inline;color:#00100B;">PetIQ, Inc. completed the
acquisition of VIP from VIP Holdings, LLC (“VIPH” or the “Sellers”
). VIP is a provider of veterinary wellness and pet preventive
services as well as a distributor of pet wellness products and
medications.&nbsp;&nbsp;VIP provides a comprehensive suite of
services at its community clinics and wellness centers hosted at
local pet retailers across 31 states, which includes diagnostic
tests, vaccinations, prescription medications, microchipping and
wellness checks.&nbsp;&nbsp;The total purchase price was
approximately $201 million, net of cash acquired and the effective
settlement of pre-existing payables between the Company and VIP at
cost which approximates fair value, and was funded through a
combination of cash on hand, borrowings under a new $75 million
term loan, a $10 million note payable, two $10 million contingent
notes, payable upon the achievement of certain combined Company
EBITDA targets, and equity consideration consisting of 4.2 million
LLC interests of PetIQ Holdings, LLC (the “LLC Interests”) and 4.2
million shares of Class B common stock of&nbsp;&nbsp;the Company.
As of March 31, 2018, the Company had issued 2.9 million shares of
Class B common stock to the Sellers.&nbsp;&nbsp;The Company will
issue the remaining 1.3 million shares of Class B common stock when
it becomes available from either exchanges with Continuing LLC
Owners or an amendment to the Articles of
Incorporation.</font></font></p>
<p style=
"margin:0pt;color:#00100B;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;font-size: 10pt;">
<font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;color:#0563C1;">
<font style="display:inline;">&nbsp;</font></font></p>
<p style=
"margin:0pt;color:#00100B;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;font-size: 10pt;">
<font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;color:#0563C1;">
<font style="display:inline;color:#00100B;">The estimate of fair
value and purchase price allocation were based on information
available at the time of closing the VIP Acquisition and the
Company continues to evaluate the underlying inputs and
assumptions.&nbsp;&nbsp;Accordingly, these</font></font></p>
</div>
<div style=
"margin-left:10.2941176470588%;margin-right:10.2941176470588%;">
<div style="width:100%">
<p style=
"margin:24pt 0pt 0pt;text-align:center;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;font-size: 10pt;">
<font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;color:#0563C1;">
<font style="display:inline;">16</font></font></p>
</div>

"margin-left:10.2941176470588%;margin-right:10.2941176470588%;">

Preliminary post-closing working capital adjustment</font></p>
</td>

</div>
<p style=
"margin:0pt;color:#000000;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;font-size: 10pt;">
<font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;color:#0563C1;">
<font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;">&nbsp;</font></font></p>
<p style=
"margin:0pt;background-color: #FFFFFF;line-height:normal;color:#000000;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;font-size: 10pt;">
<font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;color:#0563C1;">
<font style="display:inline;font-family:inherit;color:#000000;">The
definite-lived intangibles primarily relate to customer
relationships and brand names. The&nbsp;$89,800 thousand represents
the fair value and will be amortized on a straight-line basis
through&nbsp;January 2038. Amortization expense for these
definite-lived intangible assets for the three months ended March
31, 2018 was&nbsp;$1,035 thousand&nbsp;and the estimated future
amortization expense is approximately&nbsp;$3,728 thousand for the
remainder of 2018,&nbsp;and $4,970 thousand annually
thereafter.</font></font></p>
<p style=
"margin:0pt;background-color: #FFFFFF;line-height:normal;color:#000000;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;font-size: 10pt;">
<font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;color:#0563C1;">
<font style="display:inline;">&nbsp;</font></font></p>
<p style=
"margin:0pt;background-color: #FFFFFF;line-height:normal;color:#000000;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;font-size: 10pt;">
<font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;color:#0563C1;">
<font style=
"display:inline;font-family:inherit;color:#000000;">Goodwill
represents the future economic benefits that do not qualify for
separate recognition and primarily includes the assembled workforce
and other non-contractual relationships, as well as expected future
synergies. The balance was allocated to the Products and Services
segments and as shown in Note 4.</font></font></p>
<p style=
"margin:0pt;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;font-size: 10pt;">
</p>
<p style=
"margin:0pt;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;font-size: 10pt;">
</p>
</div>
<div style=
"margin-left:10.2941176470588%;margin-right:10.2941176470588%;">
<div style="width:100%">
<p style=
"margin:24pt 0pt 0pt;text-align:center;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;font-size: 10pt;">
<font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;color:#0563C1;">
<font style="display:inline;">17</font></font></p>
</div>
</div>
<div style=
"margin-left:10.2941176470588%;margin-right:10.2941176470588%;">
<hr align="center" style=
'background-color:#000000; border-width:0; color:#000000; height:2pt; lineheight:0; width:100%;' />

<p style="page-break-after:always"><font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;color:#0563C1;">
&nbsp;</font></p>
</div>
<div style=
"margin-left:10.2941176470588%;margin-right:10.2941176470588%;">
<div style="width:100%">
<p style=
"margin:0pt 0pt 30pt;color:#0563C1;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;font-size: 10pt;">
<font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;color:#0563C1;">
<a href="#TOC"><font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;color:#0563C1;">
Table of Contents</font></a></font></p>
</div>
</div>
<div style=
"margin-left:10.2941176470588%;margin-right:10.2941176470588%;">
<p style=
"margin:0pt;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;font-size: 10pt;">
</p>
<p style=
"margin:0pt;background-color: #FFFFFF;line-height:normal;text-align:justify;text-justify:inter-ideograph;color:#000000;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;font-size: 10pt;">
<font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;color:#0563C1;">
<font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;font-weight:bold;font-style:italic;">
Pro&nbsp;Forma&nbsp;Combined</font><font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;font-weight:bold;font-style:italic;color:#000000;">&nbsp;Statements
of Operations (Unaudited)</font></font></p>
<p style=
"margin:0pt;background-color: #FFFFFF;line-height:normal;text-align:justify;text-justify:inter-ideograph;color:#000000;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;font-size: 10pt;">
<font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;color:#0563C1;">
<font style="display:inline;">&nbsp;</font></font></p>
<p style=
"margin:0pt;background-color: #FFFFFF;line-height:normal;text-align:justify;text-justify:inter-ideograph;color:#00100B;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;font-size: 10pt;">
<font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;color:#0563C1;">
<font style="display:inline;color:#00100B;">The following
unaudited&nbsp;pro&nbsp;forma&nbsp;combined statements of
operations presents the Company's operations as if the VIP
Acquisition and related financing activities had occurred on
January 1, 2017. The&nbsp;pro&nbsp;forma&nbsp;information includes
the following adjustments (i) amortization of acquired
definite-lived intangible assets; (ii) depreciation based on the
fair&nbsp;value of acquired property and equipment; (iii) costs of
goods sold based on the fair value of acquired inventory; (iv)
interest expense incurred in connection with the term loan and
guaranteed note borrowings used to finance the acquisition; (v)
inclusion of equity-based compensation expense associated with
equity awards granted to certain VIP employees in connection with
the acquisition; (vi) elimination of acquisition expenses; and
(vii) VIP’s operations for the periods from January 1, 2017 to
March 31, 2017 and January 1, 2018 to January 16, 2018.
The&nbsp;pro&nbsp;forma&nbsp;combined statements of operations are
not necessarily indicative of the results of operations as they
would have been had the VIP Acquisition been effected on the
assumed date and are not intended to be a projection of future
results:</font></font></p>
<p style=
"margin:0pt;background-color: #FFFFFF;line-height:normal;text-align:justify;text-justify:inter-ideograph;color:#00100B;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;font-size: 10pt;">
<font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;color:#0563C1;">
<font style="display:inline;">&nbsp;</font></font></p>

related to these assets was&nbsp;$1,250 thousand&nbsp;and

<div style="width:100%">
<p style=
"margin:0pt 0pt 30pt;color:#0563C1;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;font-size: 10pt;">
<font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;color:#0563C1;">

<div style=
"margin-left:10.2941176470588%;margin-right:10.2941176470588%;">
<p style=
"margin:0pt;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;font-size: 10pt;">
</p>
<p style=
"margin:0pt 0pt 12pt 18pt;text-indent: -18pt;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;font-size: 10pt;">
<font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;color:#0563C1;">
<font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;font-weight:bold;">
Note 4 – Intangible Assets and Goodwilll</font></font></p>
<p style=
"margin:9pt 0pt 0pt;text-align:justify;text-justify:inter-ideograph;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;font-size: 10pt;">
<font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;color:#0563C1;">
<font style="display:inline;">Intangible assets consist of the
following at:</font></font></p>
<div style="width:100%;">
<table cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" align="center" style=
"border-collapse:collapse;width: 91.66%;">
<tr>
<td valign="bottom" style=
"width:51.82%;border-top:1pt none #D9D9D9 ;border-left:1pt none #D9D9D9 ;border-bottom:1pt none #D9D9D9 ;border-right:1pt none #D9D9D9 ;height:1.00pt;padding:0pt;">
<p style=
"margin:0pt;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;height:1.00pt;overflow:hidden;font-size:0pt;">
<font style="display:inline;font-size:1pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
</td>
<td valign="bottom" style=
"width:00.22%;border-top:1pt none #D9D9D9 ;border-left:1pt none #D9D9D9 ;border-bottom:1pt none #D9D9D9 ;border-right:1pt none #D9D9D9 ;height:1.00pt;padding:0pt;">
<p style=
"margin:0pt;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;height:1.00pt;overflow:hidden;font-size:0pt;">
<font style="display:inline;font-size:1pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;">&nbsp;</font></font></p>
<p style=

<font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;color:#0563C1;">
<font style="display:inline;">Certain intangible assets are
denominated in currencies other than the U.S. Dollar; therefore,
their gross and net carrying values are subject foreign currency
movements.&nbsp;&nbsp;Amortization expense for the months ended
March 31, 2018, and 2017, was $1,140 thousand and $260 thousand,
respectively.</font></font></p>

"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;">&nbsp;</font></font></p>
<p style=
"margin:9pt 0pt 0pt;text-align:justify;text-justify:inter-ideograph;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;font-size: 10pt;">
<font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;color:#0563C1;">
<font style="display:inline;">The following is a summary of the
changes in the carrying value of goodwill for the period from
January 1, 2018 to March 31, 2018:</font></font></p>

<p style=
"margin:0pt 0pt 0pt 18pt;text-indent: -18pt;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;font-size: 1pt;">
<font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;color:#0563C1;">
<font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;font-size:1pt;">
&nbsp;</font></font></p>
<p style=
"margin:0pt 0pt 0pt 18pt;text-indent: -18pt;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;font-size: 10pt;">
<font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;color:#0563C1;">
<font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;">&nbsp;</font></font></p>
<p style=
"margin:0pt 0pt 12pt 18pt;text-indent: -18pt;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;font-size: 10pt;">
<font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;color:#0563C1;">
<font style=
"text-indent:0pt;margin-left:0pt; padding-right:4pt;"><font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;font-weight:bold;">
Note 5 – Debt</font></font></font></p>
<p style=
"margin:0pt 0pt 12pt 18pt;text-indent: -18pt;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;font-size: 10pt;">
<font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;color:#0563C1;">
<font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;font-weight:bold;font-style:italic;">
A&amp;R Credit Agreement</font></font></p>
<p style=
"margin:0pt;text-align:justify;text-justify:inter-ideograph;border-bottom:1pt none #D9D9D9 ;color:#000000;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;font-size: 10pt;">
<font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;color:#0563C1;">
<font style="display:inline;">In connection with the VIP
Acquisition, the Company amended and restated its existing
revolving credit agreement (the “A&amp;R Credit Agreement”) on
January 17, 2018.&nbsp;&nbsp;T</font><font style=
"display:inline;color:#000000;">he A&amp;R Credit
Agreement&nbsp;provides for a secured revolving credit facility of
$50 million in the aggregate, at either LIBOR or Base (prime)
interest rates plus an applicable margin.&nbsp;&nbsp;The A&amp;R
Credit Agreement matures on January 17, 2023.</font></font></p>
<p style=
"margin:0pt;text-align:justify;text-justify:inter-ideograph;border-top:1pt none #D9D9D9 ;border-bottom:1pt none #D9D9D9 ;color:#000000;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;font-size: 10pt;">
<font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;color:#0563C1;">
<font style=
"display:inline;color:#000000;">&nbsp;&nbsp;</font></font></p>
<p style=
"margin:0pt;text-align:justify;text-justify:inter-ideograph;border-top:1pt none #D9D9D9 ;color:#000000;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;font-size: 10pt;">
<font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;color:#0563C1;">
<font style="display:inline;color:#000000;">All obligations under
the A&amp;R Credit Agreement are unconditionally guaranteed by
Holdco and each of its domestic wholly-owned subsidiaries and,
subject to certain exceptions, each of its material current and
future domestic wholly-owned subsidiaries. All obligations under
the A&amp;R Credit Agreement, and the guarantees of those
obligations, are secured</font></font></p>
</div>
<div style=
"margin-left:10.2941176470588%;margin-right:10.2941176470588%;">
<div style="width:100%">
<p style=
"margin:24pt 0pt 0pt;text-align:center;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;font-size: 10pt;">
<font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;color:#0563C1;">
<font style="display:inline;">19</font></font></p>
</div>
</div>
<div style=
"margin-left:10.2941176470588%;margin-right:10.2941176470588%;">
<hr align="center" style=
'background-color:#000000; border-width:0; color:#000000; height:2pt; lineheight:0; width:100%;' />

<p style="page-break-after:always"><font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;color:#0563C1;">
&nbsp;</font></p>
</div>
<div style=
"margin-left:10.2941176470588%;margin-right:10.2941176470588%;">
<div style="width:100%">
<p style=
"margin:0pt 0pt 30pt;color:#0563C1;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;font-size: 10pt;">
<font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;color:#0563C1;">
<a href="#TOC"><font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;color:#0563C1;">
Table of Contents</font></a></font></p>
</div>
</div>
<div style=
"margin-left:10.2941176470588%;margin-right:10.2941176470588%;">
<p style=
"margin:0pt;text-align:justify;text-justify:inter-ideograph;border-top:1pt none #D9D9D9 ;color:#000000;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;font-size: 10pt;">
<font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;color:#0563C1;">
<font style="display:inline;color:#000000;">by substantially all of
the assets of each borrower and guarantor under the A&amp;R Credit
Agreement, subject to certain exceptions.</font></font></p>
<p style=
"margin:0pt;text-align:justify;text-justify:inter-ideograph;border-bottom:1pt none #D9D9D9 ;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;font-size: 10pt;">
<font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;color:#0563C1;">
<font style="display:inline;">&nbsp;</font></font></p>
<p style=
"margin:0pt;text-align:justify;text-justify:inter-ideograph;border-top:1pt none #D9D9D9 ;border-bottom:1pt none #D9D9D9 ;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;font-size: 10pt;">
<font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;color:#0563C1;">
<font style="display:inline;">Also in connection with the closing
of the VIP Acquisition, the Company entered into a term loan credit
agreement (the “Term Loan Credit Agreement”).&nbsp;</font>
<font style="display:inline;color:#000000;">The Term Loan Credit
Agreement&nbsp;provides for a secured term loan credit facility of
$75 million in aggregate at either LIBOR or Base (prime) interest
rates plus an applicable margin.&nbsp;&nbsp;The Term Loan Credit
Agreement requires quarterly principal payments, with the full
balance due on January 17, 2023.</font></font></p>
<p style=
"margin:0pt;border-top:1pt none #D9D9D9 ;border-bottom:1pt none #D9D9D9 ;color:#00100B;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;font-size: 10pt;">
<font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;color:#0563C1;">
<font style="display:inline;">&nbsp;</font></font></p>
<p style=
"margin:0pt 0pt 12pt;border-top:1pt none #D9D9D9 ;border-bottom:1pt none #D9D9D9 ;color:#00100B;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;font-size: 10pt;">
<font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;color:#0563C1;">
<font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;color:#00100B;">
As of March 31, 2018, the Company had $43 million outstanding under
the A&amp;R Credit Agreement and $75 million under the Term Loan
Credit Agreement. The interest rate on the A&amp;R Credit Agreement
was 4.75% as a Base Rate loan, the interest rate on the Term Loan
Credit Agreement was 6.97% as a LIBOR rate loan.&nbsp;&nbsp;The
A&amp;R Credit Agreement contains a lockbox
mechanism.</font></font></p>
<p style=
"margin:0pt 0pt 12pt;border-top:1pt none #D9D9D9 ;color:#00100B;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;font-size: 10pt;">
<font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;color:#0563C1;">
<font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;color:#00100B;">
The A&amp;R Credit Agreement and Term Loan Credit Agreement
contains certain covenants and restrictions including a fixed
charge coverage ratio and a minimum EBITDA target and is secured by
collateral consisting of a percentage of eligible accounts
receivable, inventories, and machinery and equipment. As of March
31, 2018, the Company was in compliance with these
covenants.</font></font></p>
<p style=
"margin:0pt 0pt 12pt 18pt;text-indent: -18pt;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;font-size: 10pt;">
<font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;color:#0563C1;">
<font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;font-weight:bold;font-style:italic;">
Prior Credit Agreement</font></font></p>
<p style=
"margin:0pt 0pt 12pt;color:#00100B;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;font-size: 10pt;">
<font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;color:#0563C1;">
<font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;color:#00100B;">
The Company entered</font> <font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;">into</font>
<font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;color:#00100B;">
a previous credit agreement (“Prior Credit Agreement”) on December
21, 2016.&nbsp;&nbsp;The Prior Credit Agreement provided for
secured financing of $50,000 thousand in aggregate at either LIBOR
or Base (prime) interest rates plus an applicable margin,
consisting of:</font></font></p>
<p style=
"margin:0pt;text-indent:36pt;text-align:justify;text-justify:inter-ideograph;color:#00100B;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;font-size: 10pt;">
<font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;color:#0563C1;">
<font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;color:#00100B;">
(i) $45,000&nbsp;thousand revolving credit facility (“Prior
Revolver”) maturing on December 16, 2019; and</font></font></p>
<p style=
"margin:0pt 4.5pt 0pt 0pt;text-indent:36pt;text-align:justify;text-justify:inter-ideograph;color:#00100B;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;font-size: 10pt;">
<font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;color:#0563C1;">
<font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;color:#00100B;">
(ii) $5,000 thousand term loan (“Prior Term Loans”), requiring
equal amortizing payments for 24 months.</font></font></p>
<p style=
"margin:0pt 4.5pt 0pt 0pt;text-indent:27pt;text-align:justify;text-justify:inter-ideograph;color:#00100B;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;font-size: 10pt;">
<font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;color:#0563C1;">
<font style="display:inline;">&nbsp;</font></font></p>
<p style=
"margin:0pt 0pt 12pt;color:#00100B;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;font-size: 10pt;">
<font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;color:#0563C1;">
<font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;color:#00100B;">
As of December 31, 2017, the Company had fully repaid the Prior
Term Loans and had $15,325&nbsp;thousand outstanding under the
Prior Revolver. The interest</font> <font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;">rate</font>
<font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;color:#00100B;">
on the Prior Revolver was 5.00%&nbsp;as a Base Rate
loan.&nbsp;&nbsp;All amounts outstanding under the Prior Revolver
were repaid in connection with the A&amp;R Credit
Agreement.</font></font></p>
<p style=
"margin:0pt 0pt 12pt 18pt;text-indent: -18pt;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;font-size: 10pt;">
<font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;color:#0563C1;">
<font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;font-weight:bold;font-style:italic;">
Other Debt</font></font></p>
<p style=
"margin:0pt 0pt 12pt;border-bottom:1pt none #D9D9D9 ;color:#00100B;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;font-size: 10pt;">
<font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;color:#0563C1;">
<font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;color:#00100B;">
The Company entered into a mortgage with a local bank to finance
$1.92 million of the purchase price of a commercial building in
Eagle, Idaho, in July 2017.&nbsp;&nbsp;The mortgage bears interest
at a fixed rate of 4.35% and utilizes a 25 year amortization
schedule with a 10 year balloon payment of the balance due at that
time.&nbsp;</font></font></p>
<p style=
"margin:0pt 0pt 12pt;border-top:1pt none #D9D9D9 ;color:#00100B;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;font-size: 10pt;">
<font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;color:#0563C1;">
<font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;color:#00100B;">
In connection with the VIP Acquisition, the Company entered into a
guarantee note which requires the Company to pay $10 million on
July 17, 2023.&nbsp;&nbsp;The note bears interest at a fixed 6.75%
and requires quarterly interest payments.&nbsp;</font></font></p>
<p style=
"margin:0pt 0pt 12pt;color:#000000;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;font-size: 10pt;">
<font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;color:#0563C1;">
<font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;color:#000000;">
The following represents the Company’s long-term debt as
of:</font></font></p>

&nbsp;</font></p>

<div style="width:100%">
<p style=
"margin:24pt 0pt 0pt;text-align:center;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;font-size: 10pt;">
<font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;color:#0563C1;">
<font style="display:inline;">20</font></font></p>

<div style=

<hr align="center" style=
'background-color:#000000; border-width:0; color:#000000; height:2pt; lineheight:0; width:100%;' />

<p style="page-break-after:always"><font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;color:#0563C1;">
&nbsp;</font></p>
</div>
<div style=
"margin-left:10.2941176470588%;margin-right:10.2941176470588%;">
<div style="width:100%">
<p style=
"margin:0pt 0pt 30pt;color:#0563C1;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;font-size: 10pt;">
<font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;color:#0563C1;">
<a href="#TOC"><font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;color:#0563C1;">
Table of Contents</font></a></font></p>
</div>
</div>
<div style=
"margin-left:10.2941176470588%;margin-right:10.2941176470588%;">
<p style=
"margin:0pt;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;font-size: 10pt;">
</p>
<p style=
"margin:0pt 0pt 12pt;color:#000000;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;font-size: 10pt;">
<font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;color:#0563C1;">
<font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;color:#000000;">
Future maturities of long-term debt, excluding the net discount on
debt and deferred financing fees, as of March 31, 2018, are as
follows:</font></font></p>
<div style="width:100%;">
<table cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" align="center" style=
"border-collapse:collapse;width: 80.00%;">
<tr>
<td valign="bottom" style=
"width:83.92%;border-top:1pt none #D9D9D9 ;border-left:1pt none #D9D9D9 ;border-bottom:1pt none #D9D9D9 ;border-right:1pt none #D9D9D9 ;height:1.00pt;padding:0pt;">
<p style=
"margin:0pt;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;height:1.00pt;overflow:hidden;font-size:0pt;">
<font style="display:inline;font-size:1pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
</td>
<td valign="bottom" style=

<p style=
"margin:0pt;color:#000000;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;font-size: 10pt;">
<font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;color:#0563C1;">
<font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;">&nbsp;</font></font></p>
<p style=
"margin:0pt 0pt 12pt;color:#000000;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;font-size: 10pt;">
<font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;color:#0563C1;">
<font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;color:#000000;">
The Company incurred debt issuance costs of $250 thousand related
to the A&amp;R Credit Agreement and $2,363 thousand related to the
Term Loan during the three months ended March 31,
2018.</font></font></p>
<p style=
"margin:0pt 0pt 12pt;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;font-size: 10pt;">
<font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;color:#0563C1;">
<font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;font-weight:bold;">
Note 6 – &nbsp;Leases</font></font></p>
<p style=
"margin:0pt 0pt 12pt;color:#000000;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;font-size: 10pt;">
<font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;color:#0563C1;">
<font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;color:#000000;">
The Company leases certain real estate, for commercial, production,
and retail purposes, as well as equipment from third parties. Lease
expiration</font> <font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;">dates</font>
<font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;color:#000000;">
are between 2018 and 2025.&nbsp;&nbsp;A portion of capital leases
are denominated in foreign currencies.&nbsp;&nbsp;Many of these
leases include renewal options and in some cases options to
purchase.</font></font></p>
<p style=
"margin:0pt 0pt 12pt;color:#000000;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;font-size: 10pt;">
<font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;color:#0563C1;">
<font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;color:#000000;">
Annual future commitments under non-cancelable leases as of March
31, 2018, consist of the following:</font></font></p>
