</div>
<p style=
"margin:0pt;color:#000000;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;font-size: 10pt;">
<font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;color:#0563C1;">
<font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;">&nbsp;</font></font></p>
<p style=
"margin:0pt 0pt 12pt;line-height:101.67%;color:#00100B;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;font-size: 10pt;">
<font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;color:#0563C1;">
<font style="display:inline;color:#00100B;">The net book value of
assets under capital lease was $4,285 thousand and $850 thousand as
of March 31, 2018 and December 31, 2017, respectively. Total
operating lease expense for the three months ended March 31, 2018
and 2017 totaled $862 thousand and $460 thousand,
respectively.</font></font></p>
<p style=
"margin:0pt 0pt 12pt;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;font-size: 10pt;">
<font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;color:#0563C1;">
<font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;font-weight:bold;color:#000000;">
Note 7 – Income Tax</font></font></p>
<p style=
"margin:0pt 0pt 12pt;color:#000000;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;font-size: 10pt;">
<font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;color:#0563C1;">
<font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;color:#000000;">
As a result of the IPO and related reorganization transactions
completed in July 2017, the Company held an economic interest of
approximately 62% in Holdco and consolidates the financial position
and results of Holdco.&nbsp;&nbsp;The approximate 38% of Holdco not
held by the Company in the period after the IPO through December
31, 2017 is considered non-controlling interest.&nbsp;&nbsp;Holdco
is treated as a partnership for income tax
reporting.&nbsp;&nbsp;Holdco’s members, including the Company, are
liable for federal, state, and local income taxes based on their
share of Holdco’s taxable income.&nbsp;</font></font></p>
<p style=
"margin:0pt;color:#000000;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;font-size: 10pt;">
<font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;color:#0563C1;">
<font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;color:#000000;">
On December 22, 2017, Tax Cuts and Jobs Act (“TCJA”) was signed
into law. The TCJA includes a number of provisions, including (1)
the lowering of the U.S. corporate tax rate from 35 percent to 21
percent; (2) elimination of the corporate alternative minimum tax
(AMT); (3) a general elimination of U.S. federal income taxes on
dividends from foreign subsidiaries; (4) a new provision designed
to tax global intangible low-taxed income (GILTI), which allows
for</font></font></p>
</div>
<div style=
"margin-left:10.2941176470588%;margin-right:10.2941176470588%;">
<div style="width:100%">
<p style=
"margin:24pt 0pt 0pt;text-align:center;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;font-size: 10pt;">
<font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;color:#0563C1;">
<font style="display:inline;">21</font></font></p>
</div>
</div>
<div style=
"margin-left:10.2941176470588%;margin-right:10.2941176470588%;">
<hr align="center" style=
'background-color:#000000; border-width:0; color:#000000; height:2pt; lineheight:0; width:100%;' />

<p style="page-break-after:always"><font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;color:#0563C1;">
&nbsp;</font></p>
</div>
<div style=
"margin-left:10.2941176470588%;margin-right:10.2941176470588%;">
<div style="width:100%">
<p style=
"margin:0pt 0pt 30pt;color:#0563C1;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;font-size: 10pt;">
<font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;color:#0563C1;">
<a href="#TOC"><font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;color:#0563C1;">
Table of Contents</font></a></font></p>
</div>
</div>
<div style=
"margin-left:10.2941176470588%;margin-right:10.2941176470588%;">
<p style=
"margin:0pt;color:#000000;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;font-size: 10pt;">
<font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;color:#0563C1;">
<font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;color:#000000;">
the possibility of using foreign tax credits (FTCs) and a deduction
of up to 50 percent to offset the income tax liability (subject to
some limitations); (5)&nbsp; a new limitation on deductible
interest expense; (6) the repeal of the domestic production
activity deduction; and (7) limitations on the deductibility of
certain executive compensation.</font></font></p>
<p style=
"margin:0pt;color:#000000;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;font-size: 10pt;">
<font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;color:#0563C1;">
<font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;">&nbsp;</font></font></p>
<p style=
"margin:0pt;color:#000000;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;font-size: 10pt;">
<font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;color:#0563C1;">
<font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;color:#000000;">
The Company recorded income tax benefit of $1,067 thousand in the
first quarter of 2018, an effective tax rate of 21.2% against loss
before taxes, and income tax expense of $0.0 in the first quarter
of 2017, an effective tax rate of 0% against income before income
taxes. Income tax expense in first three months of 2018 was
different than the U.S federal statutory income tax rate of 21%
primarily due to the impact of the non-controlling interest income
that is not taxable and the new GILTI income inclusion. The Company
does not believe it will incur a new Base Erosion and Anti-Abuse
Tax (“BEAT”) minimum tax or will have an interest expense
limitation. In 2017, the income expense in first three months of
2017 was different than the U.S Federal statutory income tax rate
of 35% is due to Holdco not being taxed as the entity was a
partnership.</font></font></p>
<p style=
"margin:0pt;color:#000000;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;font-size: 10pt;">
<font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;color:#0563C1;">
<font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;">&nbsp;</font></font></p>
<p style=
"margin:0pt;color:#000000;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;font-size: 10pt;">
<font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;color:#0563C1;">
<font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;color:#000000;">
As noted at year-end, the Company was able to reasonably estimate
certain TCJA effects and, therefore, recorded provisional
adjustments associated with the deemed repatriation transition tax
and remeasurement of certain deferred tax asset and liabilities. As
of the first quarter our accounting for the TCJA is incomplete and
the previously disclosed provisional amounts (transition tax and
remeasurement of deferred taxes) continue to be provisional. The
Company has not made any additional measurement-period adjustments
related to transition tax during 2018, because the Company has not
yet completed the calculation of the total post-1986 Earnings and
Profits (“E&amp;P”) for these foreign subsidiaries. This amount may
change when the Company finalizes the calculation of post-1986
foreign E&amp;P previously deferred from U.S. federal taxation and
finalize the amounts held in cash or other specified assets. The
Company is continuing to gather additional information to complete
our accounting for these items and expect to complete our
accounting within the prescribed measurement period. The Company
was able to reasonably estimate the remeasurement of certain
deferred tax asset and liabilities as an initial provisional amount
for the year ending December 31, 2017. The Company is continuing to
gather additional information to more precisely compute the amount
of the tax expense related to remeasurement. The accounting for
this item is not yet complete because judgement is required with
respect to the timing and deductibility of certain expenses in the
Company’s income tax return.</font></font></p>
<p style=
"margin:0pt;color:#000000;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;font-size: 10pt;">
<font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;color:#0563C1;">
<font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;">&nbsp;</font></font></p>
<p style=
"margin:0pt;color:#000000;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;font-size: 10pt;">
<font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;color:#0563C1;">
<font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;color:#000000;">
Due to the complexity of the new GILTI tax rules, the Company is
continuing to evaluate this provision of the TCJA and the
application of ASC 740. Under U.S. GAAP, we are allowed to make an
accounting policy choice of either (1) treating taxes due on future
U.S. inclusions in taxable income related to GILTI as a
current-period expense when incurred (the “period cost method”) or
(2) factoring such amounts into a company’s measurement of its
deferred taxes (the “deferred method”). Our selection of an
accounting policy related to the new GILTI tax rules will depend on
a number of different aspects of the estimated long-term effects of
this provision under the TCJA. Therefore, we have not recorded any
potential deferred tax effects related to GILTI in our financial
statements and have not made a policy decision regarding whether to
record deferred taxes on GILTI or use the period cost method. We
have, however, included an estimate of the estimated 2018 current
GILTI impact in our average effective tax rate for
2018.</font></font></p>
<p style=
"margin:0pt;color:#000000;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;font-size: 10pt;">
<font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;color:#0563C1;">
<font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;">&nbsp;</font></font></p>
<p style=
"margin:0pt 0pt 12pt;border-bottom:1pt none #D9D9D9 ;color:#000000;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;font-size: 10pt;">
<font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;color:#0563C1;">
<font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;color:#000000;">
Prior to the IPO, the Company’s predecessor for financial reporting
purposes was Opco, which is a limited liability company, and the
majority of Opco’s businesses and assets are held and operated by
limited liability</font> <font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;">companies</font><font style="display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;color:#000000;">,
which are not subject to entity-level federal or state income
taxation.&nbsp;&nbsp;Opco makes cash distributions to permit the
member to pay these taxes as needed by the member’s tax
situation.&nbsp;&nbsp;In the three months ended March 31, 2018, the
Company made cash distributions of $540 thousand.&nbsp;&nbsp;In the
three months ended March 31, 2017, the Company did not make cash
distributions. In the three months ended March 31, 2018 Opco
accrued $434 thousand for anticipated tax distributions to
Continuing LLC Owners. This liability is included in accounts
payable on the condensed consolidated balance
sheet.&nbsp;</font></font></p>
<p style=
"margin:0pt 0pt 12pt;border-top:1pt none #D9D9D9 ;color:#000000;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;font-size: 10pt;">
<font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;color:#0563C1;">
<font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;color:#000000;">
For the three months ended March 31, 2018, the Company owned a
weighted average of 56.7% of Holdco.&nbsp;</font></font></p>
<p style=
"margin:0pt;color:#000000;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;font-size: 10pt;">
<font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;color:#0563C1;">
<font style="display:inline;font-weight:bold;color:#000000;">Note 8
– Earnings per Share</font></font></p>
<p style=
"margin:0pt;color:#000000;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;font-size: 10pt;">
<font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;color:#0563C1;">
<font style="display:inline;">&nbsp;</font></font></p>
<p style=
"margin:0pt;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;font-size: 10pt;">
<font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;color:#0563C1;">
<font style="display:inline;text-decoration:underline;">Basic and
Diluted Earnings per Share</font></font></p>
<p style=
"margin:0pt;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;font-size: 10pt;">
<font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;color:#0563C1;">
<font style="display:inline;">&nbsp;</font></font></p>
<p style=
"margin:0pt;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;font-size: 10pt;">
<font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;color:#0563C1;">
<font style="display:inline;">Basic earnings per share of Class A
common stock is computed by dividing net income (loss) available to
PetIQ, Inc. by the weighted-average number of shares of Class A
common stock outstanding during the period. Diluted earnings
per</font></font></p>
</div>
<div style=
"margin-left:10.2941176470588%;margin-right:10.2941176470588%;">
<div style="width:100%">
<p style=
"margin:24pt 0pt 0pt;text-align:center;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;font-size: 10pt;">
<font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;color:#0563C1;">
<font style="display:inline;">22</font></font></p>
</div>
</div>
<div style=
"margin-left:10.2941176470588%;margin-right:10.2941176470588%;">
<hr align="center" style=
'background-color:#000000; border-width:0; color:#000000; height:2pt; lineheight:0; width:100%;' />

<p style="page-break-after:always"><font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;color:#0563C1;">
&nbsp;</font></p>
</div>
<div style=
"margin-left:10.2941176470588%;margin-right:10.2941176470588%;">
<div style="width:100%">
<p style=
"margin:0pt 0pt 30pt;color:#0563C1;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;font-size: 10pt;">
<font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;color:#0563C1;">
<a href="#TOC"><font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;color:#0563C1;">
Table of Contents</font></a></font></p>
</div>
</div>
<div style=
"margin-left:10.2941176470588%;margin-right:10.2941176470588%;">
<p style=
"margin:0pt;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;font-size: 10pt;">
<font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;color:#0563C1;">
<font style="display:inline;">share of Class A common stock is
computed by dividing net income (loss) available to PetIQ, Inc. by
the weighted-average number of shares of Class A common stock
outstanding adjusted to give effect to potentially dilutive
securities.</font></font></p>
<p style=
"margin:0pt;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;font-size: 10pt;">
<font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;color:#0563C1;">
<font style="display:inline;">&nbsp;</font></font></p>
<p style=
"margin:0pt;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;font-size: 10pt;">
<font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;color:#0563C1;">
<font style="display:inline;">As described in Note 10 — 
“Stockholders’ Equity”, on July 20, 2017, the PetIQ Holdings, LLC
Agreement (“LLC Agreement”) was amended and restated to, among
other things, (i) provide for a new single class of common
membership interests, the LLC Interests of Holdco, and (ii)
exchange all of the then-existing membership interests of the
Continuing LLC Owners for common units of Holdco. This
Recapitalization changed the relative membership rights of the
Continuing LLC Owners such that retroactive application of the
Recapitalization to periods prior to the IPO for the purposes of
calculating earnings per share would not be
appropriate.</font></font></p>
<p style=
"margin:0pt;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;font-size: 10pt;">
<font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;color:#0563C1;">
<font style="display:inline;">&nbsp;</font></font></p>
<p style=
"margin:0pt;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;font-size: 10pt;">
<font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;color:#0563C1;">
<font style="display:inline;">Prior to the IPO, the PetIQ, LLC
membership structure included several different types of LLC
interests including ownership interests and profits interests. The
Company analyzed the calculation of earnings per unit for periods
prior to the IPO using the two-class method and determined that it
resulted in values that would not be meaningful to the users of
these consolidated financial statements. Therefore, earnings per
share information has not been presented for periods prior to the
IPO on July 20, 2017.</font></font></p>
<p style=
"margin:0pt;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;font-size: 10pt;">
<font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;color:#0563C1;">
<font style="display:inline;">&nbsp;</font></font></p>
<p style=
"margin:0pt;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;font-size: 10pt;">
<font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;color:#0563C1;">
<font style="display:inline;">The following table sets forth
reconciliations of the numerators and denominators used to compute
basic and diluted earnings per share of Class A common
stock:</font></font></p>
<p style=
"margin:0pt;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;font-size: 10pt;">
<font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;color:#0563C1;">
<font style="display:inline;">&nbsp;</font></font></p>

1,929</font></p>
</td>

<tr>
<td valign="bottom" style=
"width:82.08%;border-top:1pt none #D9D9D9 ;border-left:1pt none #D9D9D9 ;border-bottom:1pt none #D9D9D9 ;border-right:1pt none #D9D9D9 ;padding:0pt;">
<p style=
"margin:0pt 0pt 0pt 12pt;color:#000000;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;font-size: 9pt;">
<font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;color:#000000;font-size:9pt;">
Net loss attributable to PetIQ, Inc. — basic</font></p>
</td>
<td valign="bottom" style=
"width:02.40%;border-top:1pt none #D9D9D9 ;border-left:1pt none #D9D9D9 ;border-bottom:1pt none #D9D9D9 ;border-right:1pt none #D9D9D9 ;padding:0pt;">
<p style=
"margin:0pt;color:#000000;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;font-size: 9pt;">
<font style="display:inline;font-size:9pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
</td>
<td valign="bottom" style=
"width:01.60%;border-top:1pt none #D9D9D9 ;border-left:1pt none #D9D9D9 ;border-bottom:1pt none #D9D9D9 ;border-right:1pt none #D9D9D9 ;padding:0pt;">
<p style=

</div>
<p style=
"margin:0pt;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;font-size: 10pt;">
<font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;color:#0563C1;">
<font style="display:inline;">&nbsp;</font></font></p>
<p style=
"margin:0pt;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;font-size: 10pt;">
<font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;color:#0563C1;">
<font style="display:inline;">Shares of the Company’s Class B
common stock do not share in the earnings or losses of the Company
and are therefore not participating securities. As such, separate
presentation of basic and diluted earnings per share of Class B
common stock under the two-class method has not been
presented.</font></font></p>
<p style=
"margin:0pt;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;font-size: 10pt;">
<font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;color:#0563C1;">
<font style="display:inline;">&nbsp;</font></font></p>
<p style=
"margin:0pt;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;font-size: 10pt;">
<font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;color:#0563C1;">
<font style="display:inline;">Shares of the Company’s Class B
common stock as well as 1,792,648 stock options and restricted
stock units have not been included in the diluted earnings per
share calculation as they have been determined to be anti-dilutive
under the if-converted method and treasury stock method,
respectively.&nbsp;</font></font></p>
<p style=
"margin:0pt;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;font-size: 10pt;">
<font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;color:#0563C1;">
<font style="display:inline;">&nbsp;</font></font></p>
<p style=
"margin:0pt;color:#000000;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;font-size: 10pt;">
<font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;color:#0563C1;">
<font style="display:inline;font-weight:bold;color:#000000;">Note 9
– Stock Based Compensation</font></font></p>
<p style=
"margin:0pt;color:#000000;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;font-size: 10pt;">
<font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;color:#0563C1;">
<font style="display:inline;">&nbsp;</font></font></p>
<p style=
"margin:0pt 0pt 6pt;border-bottom:1pt none #D9D9D9 ;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;font-size: 10pt;">
<font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;color:#0563C1;">
<font style="display:inline;font-style:italic;">PetIQ, Inc. Omnibus
Incentive Plan</font></font></p>
<p style=
"margin:0pt;border-top:1pt none #D9D9D9 ;border-bottom:1pt none #D9D9D9 ;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;font-size: 10pt;">
<font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;color:#0563C1;">
<font style="display:inline;">The PetIQ, Inc. Omnibus Incentive
Plan (the “Plan”) provides for the grant of various equity-based
incentive awards to directors of the Company, employees, and
consultants. The types of equity-based awards that may be granted
under the Plan include: stock options, stock appreciation rights
(SARs), restricted stock, restricted stock units (RSUs), and other
stock-based awards. The Company initially reserved 1,914,047
registered shares of Class A common stock for issuance under the
Plan. As of March 31, 2018, 881,399 shares were available for
issuance under the Plan.&nbsp;&nbsp;All awards issued under the
Plan may&nbsp;only be settled in shares of Class A common
stock.</font></font></p>
<p style=
"margin:0pt;border-top:1pt none #D9D9D9 ;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;font-size: 10pt;">
<font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;color:#0563C1;">
<font style="display:inline;">&nbsp;</font></font></p>
<p style=
"margin:0pt;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;font-size: 10pt;">
</p>
</div>
<div style=
"margin-left:10.2941176470588%;margin-right:10.2941176470588%;">
<div style="width:100%">
<p style=
"margin:24pt 0pt 0pt;text-align:center;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;font-size: 10pt;">
<font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;color:#0563C1;">
<font style="display:inline;">23</font></font></p>
</div>
</div>
<div style=
"margin-left:10.2941176470588%;margin-right:10.2941176470588%;">
<hr align="center" style=
'background-color:#000000; border-width:0; color:#000000; height:2pt; lineheight:0; width:100%;' />

<p style="page-break-after:always"><font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;color:#0563C1;">
&nbsp;</font></p>
</div>
<div style=
"margin-left:10.2941176470588%;margin-right:10.2941176470588%;">
<div style="width:100%">
<p style=
"margin:0pt 0pt 30pt;color:#0563C1;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;font-size: 10pt;">
<font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;color:#0563C1;">
<a href="#TOC"><font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;color:#0563C1;">
Table of Contents</font></a></font></p>
</div>
</div>
<div style=
"margin-left:10.2941176470588%;margin-right:10.2941176470588%;">
<p style=
"margin:0pt;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;font-size: 10pt;">
</p>
<p style=
"margin:0pt 0pt 6pt;border-bottom:1pt none #D9D9D9 ;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;font-size: 10pt;">
<font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;color:#0563C1;">
<font style="display:inline;font-style:italic;">PetIQ, Inc. 2018
Inducement and Retention Stock Plan for CVC
Employees</font></font></p>
<p style=
"margin:0pt 0pt 6pt;border-top:1pt none #D9D9D9 ;border-bottom:1pt none #D9D9D9 ;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;font-size: 10pt;">
<font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;color:#0563C1;">
<font style="display:inline;">PetIQ, Inc. 2018 Inducement and
Retention Stock Plan for CVC Employees (the “Inducement Plan”)
provides for the grant of stock options to employees hired in
connection with the VIP Acquisition as employment inducement awards
pursuant to NASDAQ Listing Rule 5635(c )(4).&nbsp;&nbsp;The
Inducement Plan reserved 800,000 shares of Class A Common Stock of
the Company.&nbsp;&nbsp;As of March 31, 2018, 760,000 shares were
available for issuance under the Inducement Plan.&nbsp;&nbsp;All
awards issued under the Plan may&nbsp;only be settled in shares of
Class A common stock.</font></font></p>
<p style=
"margin:0pt;border-top:1pt none #D9D9D9 ;border-bottom:1pt none #D9D9D9 ;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;font-size: 10pt;">
<font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;color:#0563C1;">
<font style="display:inline;">&nbsp;</font></font></p>
<p style=
"margin:0pt 0pt 6pt;border-top:1pt none #D9D9D9 ;border-bottom:1pt none #D9D9D9 ;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;font-size: 10pt;">
<font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;color:#0563C1;">
<font style="display:inline;text-decoration:underline;">Stock
Options</font></font></p>
<p style=
"margin:0pt;border-top:1pt none #D9D9D9 ;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;font-size: 10pt;">
<font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;color:#0563C1;">
<font style="display:inline;">The Company awards stock options to
certain employees and directors under the Plan and the Inducement
Plan, which are subject to time-based vesting conditions, typically
25% on each anniversary of the grant date until fully
vested.&nbsp;&nbsp;Upon a termination of service relationship by
the Company, all unvested options will be forfeited and the shares
of common stock underlying such awards will become available for
issuance under the Plan. The maximum contractual term for stock
options is&nbsp;10 years.</font></font></p>
<p style=
"margin:0pt;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;font-size: 10pt;">
<font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;color:#0563C1;">
<font style="display:inline;">&nbsp;</font></font></p>
<p style=
"margin:0pt;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;font-size: 10pt;">
<font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;color:#0563C1;">
<font style="display:inline;">The fair value of these equity awards
is amortized to equity based compensation expense over the vesting
period, which totaled $697 thousand for the three months ended
March 31, 2018.&nbsp;&nbsp;All stock based compensation expense is
included in general and administrative expenses based on the role
of recipients.&nbsp;&nbsp;The fair value of the stock option awards
was determined on the grant date using the Black-Scholes valuation
model based on the following weighted-average assumptions for the
period ended March 31 2018:</font></font></p>
<p style=
"margin:0pt;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;font-size: 10pt;">
<font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;color:#0563C1;">
<font style="display:inline;">&nbsp;</font></font></p>

<tr>
<td style="width:18pt;">
<p style="width:18pt;font-size:0pt;"></p>
</td>
<td valign="top" align="left" style="width: 18.00pt;">
<p style=
"border-bottom:1pt none #D9D9D9 ;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;font-size: 10pt;margin:0pt 0pt 3pt;">
<sup style=
"margin:0pt 0pt 3pt;border-bottom:1pt none #D9D9D9;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;font-size:10pt;;">
(1)</sup></p>
</td>
<td style="width:0pt;">
<p style="width:0pt;width:0pt;font-size:0pt;"></p>
</td>
<td align="left" valign="top">
<p style=
"border-bottom:1pt none #D9D9D9 ;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;font-size: 10pt;margin:0pt 0pt 3pt;">
<font style="display:inline;color:#000000;">The Company utilized
the simplified method to determine the expected term of the stock
options since we do not have sufficient historical exercise data to
provide a reasonable basis upon which to estimate expected
term.</font></p>
</td>
</tr>
</table>
</div>
<div style="width:100%">
<table style="width:100%;" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0">
<tr>
<td style="width:18pt;">
<p style="width:18pt;font-size:0pt;"></p>
</td>
<td valign="top" align="left" style="width: 18.00pt;">
<p style=
"border-top:1pt none #D9D9D9 ;border-bottom:1pt none #D9D9D9 ;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;font-size: 10pt;margin:0pt 0pt 3pt;">
<sup style=
"margin:0pt 0pt 3pt;border-top:1pt none #D9D9D9;border-bottom:1pt none #D9D9D9;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;font-size:10pt;;">
(2)</sup></p>
</td>
<td style="width:0pt;">
<p style="width:0pt;width:0pt;font-size:0pt;"></p>
</td>
<td align="left" valign="top">
<p style=
"border-top:1pt none #D9D9D9 ;border-bottom:1pt none #D9D9D9 ;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;font-size: 10pt;margin:0pt 0pt 3pt;">
<font style="display:inline;color:#000000;">The expected volatility
assumption was calculated based on a peer group analysis of stock
price volatility with a look back period consistent with the
expected option term.</font></p>
</td>
</tr>
</table>
</div>
<div style="width:100%">
<table style="width:100%;" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0">
<tr>
<td style="width:18pt;">
<p style="width:18pt;font-size:0pt;"></p>
</td>
<td valign="top" align="left" style="width: 18.00pt;">
<p style=
"border-top:1pt none #D9D9D9 ;border-bottom:1pt none #D9D9D9 ;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;font-size: 10pt;margin:0pt 0pt 3pt;">
<sup style=
"margin:0pt 0pt 3pt;border-top:1pt none #D9D9D9;border-bottom:1pt none #D9D9D9;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;font-size:10pt;;">
(3)</sup></p>
</td>
<td style="width:0pt;">
<p style="width:0pt;width:0pt;font-size:0pt;"></p>
</td>
<td align="left" valign="top">
<p style=
"border-top:1pt none #D9D9D9 ;border-bottom:1pt none #D9D9D9 ;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;font-size: 10pt;margin:0pt 0pt 3pt;">
<font style="display:inline;color:#000000;">The risk-free interest
rate was based on the U.S. Treasury yield curve in effect at the
time of grant, which corresponds to the expected term of the stock
options.</font></p>
</td>
</tr>
</table>
</div>
<div style="width:100%">
<table style="width:100%;" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0">
<tr>
<td style="width:18pt;">

</td>
<td valign="top" align="left" style="width: 18.00pt;">
<p style=
"border-top:1pt none #D9D9D9 ;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;font-size: 10pt;margin:0pt 0pt 3pt;">

(4)</sup></p>
</td>
<td style="width:0pt;">
<p style="width:0pt;width:0pt;font-size:0pt;"></p>
</td>
<td align="left" valign="top">
<p style=
"border-top:1pt none #D9D9D9 ;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;font-size: 10pt;margin:0pt 0pt 3pt;">
<font style="display:inline;color:#000000;">The Company has not
paid and does not anticipate paying a cash dividend on our common
stock</font></p>
</td>
</tr>
</table>
</div>
<p style=
"margin:0pt;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;font-size: 10pt;">
<font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;color:#0563C1;">
<font style="display:inline;">There were no grants issued during
the three month period ended March 31, 2017.</font></font></p>
<p style=
"margin:0pt;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;font-size: 10pt;">

"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;color:#0563C1;">

</td>
<td valign="bottom" style=

</p>
</div>
<div style=
"margin-left:10.2941176470588%;margin-right:10.2941176470588%;">
<div style="width:100%">
<p style=
"margin:24pt 0pt 0pt;text-align:center;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;font-size: 10pt;">
<font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;color:#0563C1;">
<font style="display:inline;">24</font></font></p>
</div>
</div>
<div style=
"margin-left:10.2941176470588%;margin-right:10.2941176470588%;">
<hr align="center" style=
'background-color:#000000; border-width:0; color:#000000; height:2pt; lineheight:0; width:100%;' />

<p style="page-break-after:always"><font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;color:#0563C1;">
&nbsp;</font></p>
</div>
<div style=
"margin-left:10.2941176470588%;margin-right:10.2941176470588%;">
<div style="width:100%">
<p style=
"margin:0pt 0pt 30pt;color:#0563C1;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;font-size: 10pt;">
<font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;color:#0563C1;">
<a href="#TOC"><font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;color:#0563C1;">
Table of Contents</font></a></font></p>
</div>
</div>
<div style=
"margin-left:10.2941176470588%;margin-right:10.2941176470588%;">
<p style=
"margin:0pt;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;font-size: 10pt;">
</p>
<p style=
"margin:0pt;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;font-size: 10pt;">
<font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;color:#0563C1;">
<font style="display:inline;">&nbsp;</font></font></p>
<p style=
"margin:0pt;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;font-size: 10pt;">
<font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;color:#0563C1;">
<font style="display:inline;">The weighted average grant date fair
value of stock options granted during the period ended March 31,
2018 was $10.02 per option. At March 31, 2018, total unrecognized
compensation cost related to unvested stock options was $13.1
million and is expected to be recognized over a weighted-average
period of 3.6 years.&nbsp;</font></font></p>
<p style=
"margin:0pt;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;font-size: 10pt;">
<font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;color:#0563C1;">
<font style="display:inline;">&nbsp;</font></font></p>
<p style=
"margin:0pt 0pt 6pt;border-bottom:1pt none #D9D9D9 ;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;font-size: 10pt;">
<font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;color:#0563C1;">
<font style="display:inline;text-decoration:underline;">Restricted
Stock</font></font></p>
<p style=
"margin:0pt;border-top:1pt none #D9D9D9 ;border-bottom:1pt none #D9D9D9 ;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;font-size: 10pt;">
<font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;color:#0563C1;">
<font style="display:inline;">The Company awards RSUs to certain
employees and directors under the Plan, which are subject to
time-based vesting conditions, typically 33% on each anniversary of
the grant date until fully vested.&nbsp;&nbsp;Upon a termination of
service relationship by the Company, all unvested RSUs will be
forfeited and the shares of common stock underlying such awards
will become available for issuance under the Plan. The fair value
of RSUs are measured based on the closing fair market value of the
Company’s common stock on the date of grant.&nbsp;&nbsp;At March
31, 2018, total unrecognized compensation cost related to unvested
RSUs was $99 thousand and is expected to vest over a weighted
average 3 years.</font></font></p>
<p style=
"margin:0pt;border-top:1pt none #D9D9D9 ;border-bottom:1pt none #D9D9D9 ;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;font-size: 10pt;">
<font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;color:#0563C1;">
<font style="display:inline;">&nbsp;</font></font></p>
<p style=
"margin:0pt;border-top:1pt none #D9D9D9 ;border-bottom:1pt none #D9D9D9 ;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;font-size: 10pt;">
<font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;color:#0563C1;">
<font style="display:inline;">The following table summarizes the
activity of the Company’s RSUs for the period ended March 31,
2018.</font></font></p>

"margin:0pt;border-top:1pt none #D9D9D9 ;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;font-size: 10pt;">
<font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;color:#0563C1;">
<font style="display:inline;">&nbsp;</font></font></p>

<p style=
"margin:0pt;border-bottom:1pt none #D9D9D9 ;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;font-size: 10pt;">
<font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;color:#0563C1;">
<font style="display:inline;">&nbsp;</font></font></p>
<p style=
"margin:0pt;border-top:1pt none #D9D9D9 ;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;font-size: 10pt;">
<font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;color:#0563C1;">
<font style="display:inline;">There were no grants of RSUs for the
three months ended March 31, 2017.</font></font></p>
<p style=
"margin:0pt;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;font-size: 10pt;">
<font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;color:#0563C1;">
<font style="display:inline;">&nbsp;</font></font></p>
<p style=
"margin:0pt 0pt 12pt;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;font-size: 10pt;">
<font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;color:#0563C1;">
<font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;font-weight:bold;">
Note 10 – Stockho</font><font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Arial,Helvetica,sans-serif;font-weight:bold;">l</font><font style="display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;font-weight:bold;">ders’
 Equity</font></font></p>
<p style=
"margin:0pt 0pt 12pt;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;font-size: 10pt;">
<font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;color:#0563C1;">
<font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;text-decoration:underline;">
Acquisition</font></font></p>
<p style=
"margin:0pt 0pt 12pt;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;font-size: 10pt;">
<font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;color:#0563C1;">
<font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;">During
the three months ended March 31, 2018, Holdco issued 4,200,000 LLC
Interests as consideration for a business
combination.&nbsp;&nbsp;The Company issued 133,334 Class B common
shares and executed a side letter to the Unit Purchase Agreement
requiring the Company to issue additional Class B common shares as
they become available for issuance up to but not exceeding
4,200,000 Class B common shares.&nbsp;&nbsp;An additional 2,909,460
Class B common shares were issued to the Sellers during the three
months ended March 31, 2018.</font></font></p>
<p style=
"margin:0pt 0pt 12pt;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;font-size: 10pt;">
<font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;color:#0563C1;">
<font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;text-decoration:underline;">
Exchanges</font></font></p>
<p style=
"margin:0pt 0pt 12pt;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;font-size: 10pt;">
<font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;color:#0563C1;">
<font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;">During
the three months ended March 31, 2018, Continuing LLC Owners
exercised exchange rights and exchanged 2,909,460 Class B common
shares and corresponding LLC Interests for newly issued Class A
Common Stock.&nbsp;&nbsp;The LLC Agreement generally allows for
conversions on the last day of each calendar
month.&nbsp;</font></font></p>
<p style=
"margin:0pt;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;font-size: 10pt;">
<font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;color:#0563C1;">
<font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;font-weight:bold;">
Note 11 – Non-Controlling Interests</font></font></p>
<p style=
"margin:0pt;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;font-size: 10pt;">
<font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;color:#0563C1;">
<font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;">&nbsp;</font></font></p>
<p style=
"margin:0pt;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;font-size: 10pt;">
<font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;color:#0563C1;">
<font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;">The
following table presents the outstanding LLC Interests and changes
in LLC Interests for the periods presented.</font></font></p>
<p style=
"margin:0pt;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;font-size: 10pt;">
<font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;color:#0563C1;">
<font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;">&nbsp;</font></font></p>
<div style="width:100%;">

"border-collapse:collapse;width: 85.02%;">

<p style=
"margin:0pt;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;height:1.00pt;overflow:hidden;font-size:0pt;">
<font style="display:inline;font-size:1pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
</td>
<td valign="bottom" style=
"width:01.94%;border-top:1pt none #D9D9D9 ;border-left:1pt none #D9D9D9 ;border-bottom:1pt none #D9D9D9 ;border-right:1pt none #D9D9D9 ;height:1.00pt;padding:0pt;">
<p style=

</td>
<td valign="bottom" style=

</td>
<td valign="bottom" style=

</td>
<td valign="bottom" style=

<div style=
"margin-left:10.2941176470588%;margin-right:10.2941176470588%;">
<div style="width:100%">
<p style=
"margin:24pt 0pt 0pt;text-align:center;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;font-size: 10pt;">
<font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;color:#0563C1;">
<font style="display:inline;">25</font></font></p>
</div>
</div>
<div style=
"margin-left:10.2941176470588%;margin-right:10.2941176470588%;">
<hr align="center" style=
'background-color:#000000; border-width:0; color:#000000; height:2pt; lineheight:0; width:100%;' />

<p style="page-break-after:always"><font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;color:#0563C1;">
&nbsp;</font></p>
</div>
<div style=
"margin-left:10.2941176470588%;margin-right:10.2941176470588%;">
<div style="width:100%">
<p style=
"margin:0pt 0pt 30pt;color:#0563C1;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;font-size: 10pt;">
<font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;color:#0563C1;">
<a href="#TOC"><font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;color:#0563C1;">
Table of Contents</font></a></font></p>
</div>
</div>
<div style=
"margin-left:10.2941176470588%;margin-right:10.2941176470588%;">
<p style=
"margin:0pt;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;font-size: 10pt;">
</p>
<p style=
"margin:0pt 0pt 12pt;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;font-size: 10pt;">
<font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;color:#0563C1;">
<font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;font-weight:bold;">
Note 12 – Customer Concentration</font></font></p>
<p style=
"margin:0pt 0pt 12pt;color:#00100B;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;font-size: 10pt;">
<font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;color:#0563C1;">
<font style="display:inline;color:#00100B;">The Company has
significant exposure to customer concentration. During the three
months ended March 31, 2018&nbsp;and 2017, three customers,
individually accounted for more than 10% of sales. In total for the
three months ended March 31, 2018 and 2017, the
three&nbsp;customers&nbsp;accounted for 46% and 59% of net sales,
respectively. At March 31, 2018 and December 31, 2017, four and
three customers,respectively,&nbsp;individually accounted for more
than 10% of outstanding trade receivables, and in aggregate
accounted for 65%&nbsp;</font><font style=
"display:inline;color:#000000;">and 48%, respectively,</font>
<font style="display:inline;color:#00100B;">of outstanding trade
receivables, net. The customers are customers of the Products
segment.</font></font></p>
<p style=
"margin:0pt 0pt 12pt;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;font-size: 10pt;">
<font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;color:#0563C1;">
<font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;font-weight:bold;">
Note 13 – Commitments and Contingencies</font></font></p>
<p style=
"margin:0pt 0pt 12pt 18pt;text-indent: -18pt;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;font-size: 10pt;">
<font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;color:#0563C1;">
<font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;font-weight:bold;">
Litigation Contingencies</font></font></p>
<p style=
"margin:0pt 0pt 12pt;color:#000000;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;font-size: 10pt;">
<font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;color:#0563C1;">
<font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;color:#000000;">
In May 2017, Bayer Healthcare LLC and its affiliates (collectively 
“Bayer”) filed suit in the United States District Court for the
District of Delaware, against CAP IM Supply, Inc. (“CAP IM”), our
supplier of Advecta&nbsp;3 and PetLock MAX, which we began to sell
in 2017 as our value-branded alternatives to Bayer’s K9 Advantix
II. Bayer alleges that Advecta&nbsp;3 and PetLock MAX infringe a
patent relating to K9 Advantix II.&nbsp;Bayer seeks unspecified
monetary damages and an injunction against future sales by CAP IM
of Advecta&nbsp;3 and PetLock MAX to the Company. Bayer has filed a
motion for preliminary injunction, though no hearing has been set
on that motion.&nbsp; Although we have not been named in the suit,
our license and supply agreement with CAP IM requires us to share
with CAP IM the payment of defense and settlement costs of such
litigation and allows us to control the defense of the
proceeding.&nbsp;CAP IM intends to vigorously defend this case and
we believe that CAP IM has meritorious defenses.&nbsp;However,
because of the inherent uncertainties of litigation, we can provide
no assurance of an outcome favorable to CAP IM and to us.&nbsp; The
case is presently scheduled for trial in February
2019.</font></font></p>
<p style=
"margin:0pt 0pt 12pt;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;font-size: 10pt;">
<font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;color:#0563C1;">
<font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;color:#000000;">
In April 2018, Med Vets, Inc. and&nbsp; Bay Medical Solutions Inc.,
filed suit in the United States District Court for the Northern
District of California against PetIQ, Inc. and VIP Petcare
Holdings, Inc. for alleged unlawful merger and other antitrust
violations.&nbsp; The plaintiffs seek unspecified monetary damages,
and various injunctive relief, including an order to require PetIQ
to divest its interests in VIP.&nbsp; We believe that the case
lacks merit and intend to vigorously defend the case and seek any
appropriate affirmative relief from the Court.</font></font></p>
<p style=
"margin:0pt 0pt 12pt;color:#000000;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;font-size: 10pt;">
<font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;color:#0563C1;">
<font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;color:#000000;">
The Company records a liability when a particular contingency is
probable and estimable and provides disclosure for contingencies
that are at least reasonably possible of resulting in a loss
including an estimate which we currently cannot
make.&nbsp;&nbsp;The Company has not accrued for</font>
<font style="display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;">
any</font> <font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;color:#000000;">
contingency at March 31, 2018 and December 31, 2017, as the Company
does not consider any contingency to be probable or
estimable.&nbsp;&nbsp;The Company expenses legal costs as incurred
within general and administrative expenses on the consolidated
condensed statements of operations.</font></font></p>
<p style=
"margin:0pt 0pt 12pt;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;font-size: 10pt;">
<font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;color:#0563C1;">
<font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;font-weight:bold;">
Note 14 – Segments</font></font></p>
<p style=
"margin:0pt 0pt 12pt;border-bottom:1pt none #D9D9D9 ;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;font-size: 10pt;">
<font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;color:#0563C1;">
<font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;">Prior to
January 17, 2018, The Company had two operating segments, and thus
two reportable segments, which were the procurement, packaging, and
distribution of pet health and wellness products in the Domestic
markets (U.S. and Canada) and in the International markets
(primarily Europe). The determination of the operating segments was
based on the level at which the Chief Operating Decision Maker
reviews discrete financial information to assess performance and
make resource allocation decisions, which was done based on these
two geographic areas.&nbsp;</font></font></p>
<p style=
"margin:0pt 0pt 8pt;border-top:1pt none #D9D9D9 ;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;font-size: 10pt;">
<font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;color:#0563C1;">
<font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;">In
connection with our acquisition of VIP, the Company reorganized
operations to correspond with the structure of the
Company.&nbsp;&nbsp;The Company now operates the Product and
Service segments.&nbsp;&nbsp;The Product segment consists of legacy
PetIQ Domestic and International segments plus VIP’s product
distribution business.&nbsp;&nbsp;Services represents all
veterinary services provided by the Company directly to consumers.
The segments are based on the discrete financial information
reviewed by the Chief Operating Decision Maker to make resource
allocation decisions and to evaluate
performance.&nbsp;&nbsp;Certain corporate costs are not included in
this analysis, such as accounting, legal, human resources,
information technology and corporate headquarters
expenses.&nbsp;&nbsp;Additionally certain expense types are
allocated to the corporate portion of the Company, such as stock
based compensation, amortization expense on intangible assets,
interest expense,</font></font></p>
</div>
<div style=
"margin-left:10.2941176470588%;margin-right:10.2941176470588%;">
<div style="width:100%">
<p style=
"margin:24pt 0pt 0pt;text-align:center;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;font-size: 10pt;">
<font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;color:#0563C1;">
<font style="display:inline;">26</font></font></p>
</div>
</div>
<div style=
"margin-left:10.2941176470588%;margin-right:10.2941176470588%;">
<hr align="center" style=
'background-color:#000000; border-width:0; color:#000000; height:2pt; lineheight:0; width:100%;' />

<p style="page-break-after:always"><font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;color:#0563C1;">
&nbsp;</font></p>

"margin-left:10.2941176470588%;margin-right:10.2941176470588%;">
<div style="width:100%">
<p style=
"margin:0pt 0pt 30pt;color:#0563C1;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;font-size: 10pt;">

"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;color:#0563C1;">

<font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;color:#0563C1;">
<font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;">foreign
currency exchange adjustments, and income taxes.&nbsp;&nbsp;All
prior period disclosures have been restated to reflect these new
reportable operating segments.</font></font></p>
<p style=
"margin:0pt;color:#000000;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;font-size: 10pt;">
<font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;color:#0563C1;">
<font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;color:#000000;">

for the three months ended:</font></font></p>

<tr>

$</font></p>

</div>
<p style=
"margin:0pt;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;font-size: 1pt;">
<font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;color:#0563C1;">
<font style=
"display:inline;font-size:1pt;">&nbsp;</font></font></p>
<p style=
"margin:0pt;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;font-size: 10pt;">
<font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;color:#0563C1;">
<font style="display:inline;">&nbsp;</font></font></p>
<p style=
"margin:0pt 0pt 12pt;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;font-size: 10pt;">
<font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;color:#0563C1;">
<font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;font-weight:bold;">
Note 15 – Related Parties</font></font></p>
<p style=
"margin:0pt 0pt 12pt;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;font-size: 10pt;">
<font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;color:#0563C1;">
<font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;">Opco had
entered into management consulting services agreements with members
of Holdco.&nbsp;&nbsp;The services were related to financial
transactions and other senior management matters related to
business administration.&nbsp;&nbsp;Those agreements provided for
the Company to pay base annual management fees plus expenses,
typically paid quarterly.&nbsp;&nbsp;These expenses were recorded
in general and administrative expenses in the condensed
consolidated statement of comprehensive income
(loss).&nbsp;&nbsp;The Company recorded $190 thousand of expense
for the three months ended March 31, 2017.&nbsp;&nbsp;Upon
consummation of the recapitalization and IPO transactions, these
agreements were terminated.&nbsp;</font></font></p>
<p style=
"margin:0pt 0pt 12pt;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;font-size: 10pt;">
<font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;color:#0563C1;">
<font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;">As
discussed in Note 7– “Income Taxes”, the Company has accrued tax
distributions that are payable to Continuing LLC Owners to
facilitate the Continuing LLC Owners periodic estimated tax
obligations.&nbsp;&nbsp;At March 31, 2018, and December 31, 2017,
the Company had an accrual of $491 thousand and $597 thousand,
respectively, for estimated tax distributions, which are included
in accounts payable on the condensed consolidated balance
sheets.</font></font></p>
<p style=
"margin:0pt;text-align:justify;text-justify:inter-ideograph;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;font-size: 10pt;">
<font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;color:#0563C1;">
<font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;">The
Company leases office and warehouse space from a company under
common control of the Sellers, commencing on January 17, 2018. The
Company incurred rent expenses of $73 thousand in the three months
ended March 31, 2018.&nbsp;</font></font></p>
<p style=
"margin:0pt;text-align:justify;text-justify:inter-ideograph;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;font-size: 10pt;">
<font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;color:#0563C1;">
<font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;">&nbsp;</font></font></p>
<p style=
"margin:0pt 0pt 12pt;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;font-size: 10pt;">
<font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;color:#0563C1;">
<font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;font-weight:bold;">
Note 16 – Subsequent events</font></font></p>
<p style=
"margin:0pt;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;font-size: 10pt;">
<font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;color:#0563C1;">
<font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;">In April
2018, as part of the integration of VIP operations, the Company
implemented a rationalization plan with respect to its services
segment.&nbsp;&nbsp;The plan resulted in the Company discontinuing
underperforming mobile clinics and reducing headcount associated
with those clinics.&nbsp;&nbsp;The discontinued clinics generated
approximately $430 thousand of service revenue in the three months
ended March 31, 2018 and approximately $371 thousand of operating
loss.&nbsp;&nbsp;The Compay expects to incur additional expenses
primarily in the second quarter of 2018 related to severance and
contract termination costs during the remainder of
2018.</font></font></p>
<p style=
"margin:0pt 0pt 12pt;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;font-weight:bold;font-size: 2pt;">
<font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;color:#0563C1;">
<font style=
"display:inline;font-size:2pt;">&nbsp;</font></font></p>
<p style=
"margin:0pt 0pt 12pt;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;font-size: 10pt;">
<font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;color:#0563C1;">
&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style=
"margin:0pt;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;font-size: 10pt;">
</p>
</div>
<div style=
"margin-left:10.2941176470588%;margin-right:10.2941176470588%;">
<div style="width:100%">
<p style=
"margin:24pt 0pt 0pt;text-align:center;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;font-size: 10pt;">
<font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;color:#0563C1;">
<font style="display:inline;">27</font></font></p>

'background-color:#000000; border-width:0; color:#000000; height:2pt; lineheight:0; width:100%;' />

"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;color:#0563C1;">

<div style=
"margin-left:10.2941176470588%;margin-right:10.2941176470588%;">
<div style="width:100%">
<p style=
"margin:0pt 0pt 30pt;color:#0563C1;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;font-size: 10pt;">
<font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;color:#0563C1;">
<a href="#TOC"><font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;color:#0563C1;">
Table of Contents</font></a></font></p>

</div>
<div style=
"margin-left:10.2941176470588%;margin-right:10.2941176470588%;">
<p style=
"margin:0pt;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;font-size: 10pt;">
</p>
<p style=
"margin:0pt 0pt 12pt;border-bottom:1pt none #D9D9D9 ;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;font-size: 10pt;">
<font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;color:#0563C1;">
<a name="_contentSection_136d3a22_b7cc_4258_a779_" id=
"_contentSection_136d3a22_b7cc_4258_a779_"></a><font style=
"display:inline;font-weight:bold;">Item&nbsp;2.&nbsp;&nbsp;Management’
s Discussion and Analysis of Financial Condition and Results of
Operations.<a name="Item2ManagementsDiscussionandAnalysis_46" id=
"Item2ManagementsDiscussionandAnalysis_46"></a></font></font></p>
<p style=
"margin:0pt 0pt 12pt;border-top:1pt none #D9D9D9 ;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;font-size: 10pt;">
<font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;color:#0563C1;">
<font style="display:inline;font-style:italic;">The following is a
discussion of our results of operations and current financial
condition. This should be read in conjunction with the accompanying
unaudited condensed consolidated financial statements and related
notes included elsewhere in this Quarterly Report on Form&nbsp;10‑Q
and our audited consolidated financial statements for the year
ended December 31, 2017 and related notes included in the annual
report&nbsp;&nbsp;for PetIQ, Inc., filed with the Securities and
Exchange Commission (the “SEC”) on Form 10-K for the year ended
December 31, 2017. This discussion contains forward-looking
statements that reflect our plans, estimates, and beliefs and
involve numerous risks and uncertainties. Actual results may differ
materially from those contained in any forward-looking statements.
See “-Cautionary Note Regarding Forward-Looking Statements.”
</font></font></p>
<p style=
"margin:0pt 0pt 12pt;border-bottom:1pt none #D9D9D9 ;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;font-weight:bold;font-size: 10pt;">
<font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;color:#0563C1;">
<font style="display:inline;">Our Business</font></font></p>
<p style=
"margin:0pt 0pt 12pt;border-top:1pt none #D9D9D9 ;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;font-weight:bold;font-size: 10pt;">
<font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;color:#0563C1;">
<font style="display:inline;">Overview</font></font></p>
<p style=
"margin:0pt;border-bottom:1pt none #D9D9D9 ;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;font-size: 10pt;">
<font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;color:#0563C1;">
<font style="display:inline;">PetIQ is</font> <font style=
"display:inline;font-size:9.5pt;">a rapidly growing pet health and
wellness company providing convenient access and affordable choices
to a broad portfolio of veterinarian-recommended pet health and
wellness products across a network of leading national retail
stores, including more than 40,000 retail pharmacy locations. PetIQ
believes that pets are an important part of the family and deserve
the best pet care we can give them. Through our retail
relationships, we encourage pet owners to regularly visit their
veterinarian and educate them about the importance of
veterinarian-grade products.&nbsp;&nbsp;During the three months
ended March 31, 2018, we completed the acquisition of VIP
Petcare.&nbsp;&nbsp;Through VIP, we provide veterinary services to
pet owners in over 31 states.&nbsp;</font></font></p>
<p style=
"margin:0pt;border-top:1pt none #D9D9D9 ;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;font-size: 9pt;">
<font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;color:#0563C1;">
<font style=
"display:inline;font-size:9.5pt;">&nbsp;</font></font></p>
<p style=
"margin:0pt;background-color: #FFFFFF;text-align:justify;text-justify:inter-ideograph;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;font-size: 9pt;">
<font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;color:#0563C1;">
<font style="display:inline;font-size:9.5pt;">On January 17, 2018,
we acquired Community Veterinary Clinics, LLC d/b/a VIP Petcare (
“VIP,” and such acquisition, the “VIP Acquisition”). The aggregate
consideration, comprised of (i) $100 million in cash (ii) 4,200,000
membership units of Holdings (the “LLC Interests”) and 4,200,000
shares of Class B common stock, $0.001 par value per share, of the
Company (the “Class B Issuance” and together with the LLC
Interests, the “Equity Consideration”) and (iii) promissory notes
consisting of (A) a $10.0 million note payable 5 years and 6 months
after the closing, which shall accrue interest quarterly in arrears
at a rate of 6.75% per annum and (B) two $10 million contingent
notes, payable upon the achievement of certain combined Company
EBITDA targets for 2018 and 2019, which, if payable, shall accrue
interest quarterly in arrears at a rate of 6.75% per annum
beginning once earned; VIP provides a comprehensive suite of
services at community clinics and wellness centers hosted at local
pet retailers across 31 states.</font></font></p>
<p style=
"margin:0pt;border-bottom:1pt none #D9D9D9 ;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;font-size: 9pt;">
<font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;color:#0563C1;">
<font style=
"display:inline;font-size:9.5pt;">&nbsp;</font></font></p>
<p style=
"margin:0pt;border-top:1pt none #D9D9D9 ;border-bottom:1pt none #D9D9D9 ;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;font-size: 9pt;">
<font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;color:#0563C1;">
<font style="display:inline;font-size:9.5pt;">Our sales occur
predominantly in the U.S. and Canada. Approximately 99% and 98% of
our three months ended March 31, 2018 and fiscal 2017,
respectively, net sales were generated from customers located in
the United States and Canada, with the remaining sales generated
from other foreign locations. We have two reporting segments: (i)
Products; and (ii) Services. This is based on the level at which
the chief operating decision maker reviews the results of
operations to make decisions regarding performance assessment and
resource allocation.&nbsp;</font></font></p>
<p style=
"margin:0pt;border-top:1pt none #D9D9D9 ;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;font-size: 9pt;">
<font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;color:#0563C1;">
<font style=
"display:inline;font-size:9.5pt;">&nbsp;</font></font></p>
<p style=
"margin:0pt 0pt 12pt;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;font-size: 10pt;">
<font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;color:#0563C1;">
<font style="display:inline;font-weight:bold;">Results of
Operations</font></font></p>
<p style=
"margin:0pt;border-bottom:1pt none #D9D9D9 ;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;font-size: 10pt;">
<font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;color:#0563C1;">
<font style="display:inline;font-weight:bold;">Components of our
Results of Operations</font></font></p>
<p style=
"margin:0pt;border-top:1pt none #D9D9D9 ;border-bottom:1pt none #D9D9D9 ;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;font-size: 10pt;">
<font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;color:#0563C1;">
<font style="display:inline;">&nbsp;</font></font></p>
<p style=
"margin:0pt;border-top:1pt none #D9D9D9 ;border-bottom:1pt none #D9D9D9 ;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;font-size: 9pt;">
<font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;color:#0563C1;">
<font style=
"display:inline;font-weight:bold;font-style:italic;font-size:9.5pt;">
Net Sales</font></font></p>
<p style=
"margin:0pt;border-top:1pt none #D9D9D9 ;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;font-size: 9pt;">
<font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;color:#0563C1;">
<font style=
"display:inline;font-size:9.5pt;">&nbsp;</font></font></p>
<p style=
"margin:0pt 0pt 12pt;border-bottom:1pt none #D9D9D9 ;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;font-size: 10pt;">
<font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;color:#0563C1;">
<font style="display:inline;">Our product net sales consist of our
total sales net of product returns, allowances (discounts), trade
promotions and incentives. We offer a variety of trade promotions
and incentives to our customers, such as cooperative advertising
programs and in‑store displays. We</font> <font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;">recognize</font>
<font style="display:inline;">revenue when persuasive evidence of
an arrangement exists, in accordance with the terms of our
contracts, which generally occurs upon shipment of product, when
the price is fixed or determinable and when collectability is
reasonably assured. These trade promotions are used to increase our
aggregate net sales. Our net sales are periodically influenced by
the timing, extent and amount of such trade promotions and
incentives.</font></font></p>
<p style=
"margin:0pt 0pt 12pt;border-top:1pt none #D9D9D9 ;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;font-size: 10pt;">
<font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;color:#0563C1;">
<font style="display:inline;">Key factors that may affect our
future sales growth include: new product introductions; expansion
into e-commerce and other customer</font> <font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;">bases</font><font style="display:inline;">;
expansion of items sold to existing customers, addition of new
retail customers and to maintain</font></font></p>
</div>
<div style=
"margin-left:10.2941176470588%;margin-right:10.2941176470588%;">
<div style="width:100%">
<p style=
"margin:24pt 0pt 0pt;text-align:center;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;font-size: 10pt;">
<font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;color:#0563C1;">
<font style="display:inline;">28</font></font></p>
</div>
</div>
<div style=
"margin-left:10.2941176470588%;margin-right:10.2941176470588%;">
<hr align="center" style=
'background-color:#000000; border-width:0; color:#000000; height:2pt; lineheight:0; width:100%;' />

<p style="page-break-after:always"><font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;color:#0563C1;">
&nbsp;</font></p>
</div>
<div style=
"margin-left:10.2941176470588%;margin-right:10.2941176470588%;">
<div style="width:100%">
<p style=
"margin:0pt 0pt 30pt;color:#0563C1;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;font-size: 10pt;">
<font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;color:#0563C1;">
<a href="#TOC"><font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;color:#0563C1;">
Table of Contents</font></a></font></p>
