</div>
<div style=
"margin-left:10.2941176470588%;margin-right:10.2941176470588%;">
<p style=
"margin:0pt 0pt 12pt;border-top:1pt none #D9D9D9 ;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;font-size: 10pt;">
<font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;color:#0563C1;">
<font style="display:inline;">pricing levels necessary for
profitability; aggressive pricing by our competitors; and whether
we can maintain and develop positive relationships with key retail
customers.</font></font></p>
<p style=
"margin:0pt;border-bottom:1pt none #D9D9D9 ;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;font-size: 10pt;">
<font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;color:#0563C1;">
<font style="display:inline;">Our products are primarily
consumables and, as such, they experience a replenishment
cycle.</font></font></p>
<p style=
"margin:0pt;border-top:1pt none #D9D9D9 ;border-bottom:1pt none #D9D9D9 ;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;font-size: 10pt;">
<font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;color:#0563C1;">
<font style="display:inline;">&nbsp;</font></font></p>
<p style=
"margin:0pt;border-top:1pt none #D9D9D9 ;border-bottom:1pt none #D9D9D9 ;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;font-size: 10pt;">
<font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;color:#0563C1;">
<font style="display:inline;">Our service revenue consists of
providing veterinary services for consumers and selling products to
the consumer in conjunction with those services.&nbsp;&nbsp;The
customer renders payment at the time the service is
rendered.</font></font></p>
<p style=
"margin:0pt;border-top:1pt none #D9D9D9 ;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;font-size: 10pt;">
<font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;color:#0563C1;">
<font style="display:inline;">&nbsp;</font></font></p>
<p style=
"margin:0pt 0pt 12pt;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;font-size: 10pt;">
<font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;color:#0563C1;">
<font style="display:inline;">While many of our products are sold
consistently throughout the year, we experience seasonality in the
form of increased retailer demand for</font> <font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;">our</font>
<font style="display:inline;">flea and tick product offerings in
the first two quarters of the year in preparation for increased
consumer demand during the summer months.&nbsp;&nbsp;Additionally
our veterinary services experience seasonality as consumers
typically seek more services in the warmer
months.&nbsp;</font></font></p>
<p style=
"margin:0pt;border-bottom:1pt none #D9D9D9 ;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;font-size: 10pt;">
<font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;color:#0563C1;">
<font style=
"display:inline;font-weight:bold;font-style:italic;">Gross
Profit</font></font></p>
<p style=
"margin:0pt;border-top:1pt none #D9D9D9 ;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;font-size: 10pt;">
<font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;color:#0563C1;">
<font style="display:inline;">&nbsp;</font></font></p>
<p style=
"margin:0pt 0pt 11pt;background-color: #FFFFFF;text-align:justify;text-justify:inter-ideograph;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;font-size: 10pt;">
<font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;color:#0563C1;">
<font style="display:inline;">Gross profit is our net product sales
plus service revenue less cost of product sales and services. Our
cost of product sales consists primarily of costs of raw goods,
finished goods packaging materials, manufacturing, shipping and
handling costs and costs associated with our warehouses and
distribution network.</font> <font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;color:#000000;">
Cost of services are comprised of all service and product costs
related to provide veterinary services to consumers, including but
not limited to, salaries of veterinarians, technicians and other
clinic based personnel, transportation and delivery costs,
facilities rent, occupancy costs, supply costs, depreciation and
amortization of clinic assets, certain marketing and promotional
expenses and costs of goods sold.</font><font style=
"display:inline;">&nbsp;</font></font></p>
<p style=
"margin:0pt 0pt 11pt;background-color: #FFFFFF;text-align:justify;text-justify:inter-ideograph;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;font-size: 10pt;">
<font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;color:#0563C1;">
<font style="display:inline;">Gross margin measures our gross
profit as a percentage of net sales. With respect to our
proprietary</font> <font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;">products</font><font style="display:inline;">,
we have a manufacturing network that includes leased manufacturing
facilities where we manufacture finished goods, as well as
third-party contract manufacturing facilities from which we
purchase finished products predominately on a dollar-per-unit
basis. Since our inception in 2010, we have worked closely with our
contract manufacturers to negotiate lower costs through increased
volume of purchases and price negotiations. The gross margin on our
proprietary value-branded products is higher than on our
distributed products. For distributed products, our costs are
driven largely by whether we source the product direct from the
manufacturer or a licensed distributor. Gross profit in the
services segment is driven by the number of pets that seek services
in the clinics due to the relatively fixed cost nature of providing
the clinic.</font></font></p>
<p style=
"margin:0pt;border-bottom:1pt none #D9D9D9 ;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;font-size: 10pt;">
<font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;color:#0563C1;">
<font style=
"display:inline;font-weight:bold;font-style:italic;">General and
Administrative Expenses</font></font></p>
<p style=
"margin:0pt;border-top:1pt none #D9D9D9 ;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;font-size: 10pt;">
<font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;color:#0563C1;">
<font style="display:inline;">&nbsp;</font></font></p>
<p style=
"margin:0pt 0pt 12pt;border-bottom:1pt none #D9D9D9 ;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;font-size: 10pt;">
<font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;color:#0563C1;">
<font style="display:inline;">Our general and administrative
expenses primarily consist of employee compensation and benefits
expenses, sales and merchandizing</font> <font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;">expenses</font><font style="display:inline;">,
advertising and marketing expenses, rent and lease expenses, IT and
utilities expenses, professional fees, insurance costs, R&amp;D
costs, host fees, banking charges, and consulting fees. General and
administrative expenses as a percentage of net sales have increased
from 11.0% in the first three months of 2017 to 16.5% in the first
three months of 2018, primarily driven by the VIP
Acquisition.&nbsp;&nbsp;In addition to costs directly related to
the acquisition, we acquired the corporate overhead which we are
currently integrating into the consolidated company. In the future,
we expect our general and administrative expenses to grow at a
slower rate than our net sales growth as we leverage our past
investments.</font></font></p>
<p style=
"margin:0pt 0pt 12pt;border-top:1pt none #D9D9D9 ;border-bottom:1pt none #D9D9D9 ;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;font-size: 10pt;">
<font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;color:#0563C1;">
<font style="display:inline;">Our advertising and</font>
<font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;">marketing</font>
<font style="display:inline;">expenses primarily consist of digital
marketing (e.g. search engine optimization, pay-per-click, content
marketing, etc.), social media, in-store merchandising and trade
shows in an effort to promote our brands and build
awareness.&nbsp;&nbsp;These expenses may vary from quarter to
quarter but typically they are higher in the second and third
quarters, during the flea and tick season. We expect our marketing
and advertising expenses to decrease as a percentage of net sales
as we continue to concentrate campaigns to relevant markets, as
well as shift spending towards in-store marketing and customer
trade-supported programs.</font></font></p>
<p style=
"margin:0pt 0pt 12pt;border-top:1pt none #D9D9D9 ;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;font-size: 10pt;">
<font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;color:#0563C1;">
<font style="display:inline;">As noted above, we experience
seasonality in the form of increased demand for our flea and tick
product offerings in the first two quarters of the year in
preparation for the spring and summer seasons and, as a result, the
sales and merchandizing</font> <font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;">expenses</font>
<font style="display:inline;">component of our general and
administrative expenses generally increases in the second and third
quarters due to promotional spending relating to our flea and tick
product lines.</font></font></p>
<p style=
"margin:0pt;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;font-size: 10pt;">
</p>
</div>
<div style=
"margin-left:10.2941176470588%;margin-right:10.2941176470588%;">
<div style="width:100%">
<p style=
"margin:24pt 0pt 0pt;text-align:center;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;font-size: 10pt;">
<font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;color:#0563C1;">
<font style="display:inline;">29</font></font></p>
</div>
</div>
<div style=
"margin-left:10.2941176470588%;margin-right:10.2941176470588%;">
<hr align="center" style=
'background-color:#000000; border-width:0; color:#000000; height:2pt; lineheight:0; width:100%;' />

<p style="page-break-after:always"><font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;color:#0563C1;">
&nbsp;</font></p>
</div>
<div style=
"margin-left:10.2941176470588%;margin-right:10.2941176470588%;">
<div style="width:100%">
<p style=
"margin:0pt 0pt 30pt;color:#0563C1;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;font-size: 10pt;">
<font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;color:#0563C1;">
<a href="#TOC"><font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;color:#0563C1;">
Table of Contents</font></a></font></p>
</div>
</div>
<div style=
"margin-left:10.2941176470588%;margin-right:10.2941176470588%;">
<p style=
"margin:0pt;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;font-size: 10pt;">
</p>
<p style=
"margin:0pt;border-bottom:1pt none #D9D9D9 ;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;font-size: 10pt;">
<font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;color:#0563C1;">
<font style=
"display:inline;font-weight:bold;font-style:italic;">Net Income
(Loss)</font></font></p>
<p style=
"margin:0pt;border-top:1pt none #D9D9D9 ;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;font-size: 10pt;">
<font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;color:#0563C1;">
<font style="display:inline;">&nbsp;</font></font></p>
<p style=
"margin:0pt 0pt 12pt;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;font-size: 10pt;">
<font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;color:#0563C1;">
<font style="display:inline;">Our net income (loss) for future
periods will be affected by the various factors described above. In
addition, our historical</font> <font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;">results
prior to the IPO</font> <font style="display:inline;">benefit from
insignificant income taxes due to Opco’s status as a pass-through
entity for U.S. federal income tax purposes, and we anticipate
future results will not be consistent as our net income will be
subject to U.S. federal and state income taxes.</font></font></p>
<p style=
"margin:0pt;border-bottom:1pt none #D9D9D9 ;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;font-size: 10pt;">
<font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;color:#0563C1;">
<font style="display:inline;font-weight:bold;">Results of
Operations</font></font></p>
<p style=
"margin:0pt;border-top:1pt none #D9D9D9 ;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;font-size: 10pt;">
<font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;color:#0563C1;">
<font style="display:inline;">&nbsp;</font></font></p>
<p style=
"margin:0pt 0pt 12pt;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;font-size: 10pt;">
<font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;color:#0563C1;">
<font style="display:inline;">The following</font> <font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;">table</font>
<font style="display:inline;">sets forth our consolidated
statements of income (loss) in dollars and as a percentage of net
sales for the periods presented:</font></font></p>
<div style="width:100%;">
<table cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" style=
"border-collapse:collapse;width: 99.10%;">

<p style=

$'s in 000's</font></p>

&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</font></p>
</td>

<p style=
"margin:0pt 0pt 0.05pt;text-align:center;color:#000000;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;font-size: 8pt;">

March&nbsp;31,&nbsp;2018</font></p>
</td>
<td valign="bottom" style=
"width:01.44%;border-top:1pt none #D9D9D9 ;border-left:1pt none #D9D9D9 ;border-bottom:1pt none #D9D9D9 ;border-right:1pt none #D9D9D9 ;background-color: #auto;padding:0pt;">
<p style=
"margin:0pt 0pt 0.05pt;text-align:center;color:#000000;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;font-size: 8pt;">
<font style="display:inline;font-size:8pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
</td>
<td colspan="2" valign="bottom" style=
"width:14.12%;border-top:1pt none #D9D9D9 ;border-left:1pt none #D9D9D9 ;border-bottom:1pt solid #000000 ;border-right:1pt none #D9D9D9 ;background-color: #auto;padding:0pt;">
<p style=
"margin:0pt 0pt 0.05pt;text-align:center;color:#000000;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;font-size: 8pt;">
<font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;font-weight:bold;color:#000000;font-size:8pt;">

<p style=
"margin:0pt;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;font-size: 10pt;">
<font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;color:#0563C1;">
<font style="display:inline;">&nbsp;</font></font></p>
<p style=
"margin:0pt 0pt 12pt;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;font-weight:bold;font-size: 10pt;">
<font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;color:#0563C1;">
<font style="display:inline;">Three&nbsp;Months Ended March 31,
2018 Compared With Three&nbsp;Months Ended March 31,
2017</font></font></p>
<p style=
"margin:0pt 0pt 6.6pt;color:#000000;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;font-size: 10pt;">
<font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;color:#0563C1;">
<font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;font-weight:bold;font-style:italic;color:#000000;">
Net sales</font></font></p>
<p style=
"margin:0pt 0pt 12pt;border-bottom:1pt none #D9D9D9 ;color:#000000;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;font-size: 10pt;">
<font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;color:#0563C1;">
<font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;color:#000000;">
Product sales increased $30.8 million or 46.0%, to $97.9 million
for the three months ended March 31, 2018, compared to $67.0
million for the three</font> <font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;">months</font>
<font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;color:#000000;">
ended March 31, 2017. This increase was driven primarily by
expanding item count at existing customers of existing items, as
well as growth in new customers, primarily from the VIP
Acquisition.&nbsp;&nbsp;Revenues were also impacted by the adoption
of ASU 2014-09 Revenue from Contracts with Customers (“ASC 606”),
which reduced revenue by $0.9 million relative to past practice,
this revenue will be recognized in later periods when certain
criteria are met.&nbsp;&nbsp;See Note 1 – “Principal Business
Activity and Significant Accounting Policies” to the Condensed
Consolidated Financials for more information regarding the adoption
of ASC 606.</font></font></p>
<p style=
"margin:0pt 0pt 12pt;border-top:1pt none #D9D9D9 ;color:#000000;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;font-size: 10pt;">
<font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;color:#0563C1;">
<font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;color:#000000;">
Service revenue was $17.2M, with no comparable revenue in
2017.&nbsp;&nbsp;The acquisition of the VIP service business in
January 2018 led to the addition of the services revenue in the
three months ended March 31, 2018.&nbsp;</font></font></p>
<p style=
"margin:0pt 0pt 6.6pt;color:#000000;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;font-size: 10pt;">
<font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;color:#0563C1;">
<font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;font-weight:bold;font-style:italic;color:#000000;">
Gross profit</font></font></p>
<p style=
"margin:0pt 0pt 12pt;color:#000000;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;font-size: 10pt;">
<font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;color:#0563C1;">
<font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;color:#000000;">
Gross profit increased by $3.7 million, or 30.2%, to $15.9 million
for the three months ended March 31, 2018, compared to $12.2
million for the three</font> <font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;">months</font>
<font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;color:#000000;">
ended March 31, 2017.&nbsp;&nbsp;This increase is due to the
significant sales growth, offset by the growth occurring in lower
margin items as well increased trade expenditures which reduces net
sales.&nbsp;</font></font></p>
<p style=
"margin:0pt;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;font-size: 10pt;">
</p>
</div>
<div style=
"margin-left:10.2941176470588%;margin-right:10.2941176470588%;">
<div style="width:100%">
<p style=
"margin:24pt 0pt 0pt;text-align:center;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;font-size: 10pt;">
<font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;color:#0563C1;">
<font style="display:inline;">30</font></font></p>
</div>
</div>
<div style=
"margin-left:10.2941176470588%;margin-right:10.2941176470588%;">
<hr align="center" style=
'background-color:#000000; border-width:0; color:#000000; height:2pt; lineheight:0; width:100%;' />

<p style="page-break-after:always"><font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;color:#0563C1;">
&nbsp;</font></p>
</div>
<div style=
"margin-left:10.2941176470588%;margin-right:10.2941176470588%;">
<div style="width:100%">
<p style=
"margin:0pt 0pt 30pt;color:#0563C1;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;font-size: 10pt;">
<font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;color:#0563C1;">
<a href="#TOC"><font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;color:#0563C1;">
Table of Contents</font></a></font></p>
</div>
</div>
<div style=
"margin-left:10.2941176470588%;margin-right:10.2941176470588%;">
<p style=
"margin:0pt;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;font-size: 10pt;">
</p>
<p style=
"margin:0pt 0pt 12pt;color:#000000;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;font-size: 10pt;">
<font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;color:#0563C1;">
<font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;color:#000000;">
Additionally, margin was impacted by the purchase accounting
adjustment of $1.5 million to fair value inventory and the adoption
of ASC 606 of $0.9 million.&nbsp;&nbsp;Gross margin decreased to
13.8% for the three months ended March 31, 2018, from 18.2% for the
three months ended March 31, 2017.</font></font></p>
<p style=
"margin:0pt 0pt 6.6pt;color:#000000;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;font-size: 10pt;">
<font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;color:#0563C1;">
<font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;font-weight:bold;font-style:italic;color:#000000;">
General and administrative expenses</font></font></p>
<p style=
"margin:0pt 0pt 12pt;color:#000000;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;font-size: 10pt;">
<font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;color:#0563C1;">
<font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;color:#000000;">
General and</font> <font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;">administrative</font>
<font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;color:#000000;">
expenses increased by $11.6 million or 156.2% to $19.0 million for
the three months ended March 31, 2018 compared to $7.4 million for
the three months ended March 31, 2017. The increase
reflects:</font></font></p>

</div>
<p style=
"margin:0pt 0pt 6.6pt;color:#000000;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;font-size: 10pt;">
<font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;color:#0563C1;">
<font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;font-weight:bold;font-style:italic;color:#000000;">
Interest expense, net</font></font></p>
<p style=
"margin:0pt 0pt 12pt;color:#000000;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;font-size: 10pt;">
<font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;color:#0563C1;">
<font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;color:#000000;">
Interest expense, net increased $1.3 million, or 276.1%, to $1.8
million for the three months ended March 31, 2018, compared to $0.5
million for the three months ended</font> <font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;">March 31,
2017</font><font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;color:#000000;">.
This increase was driven by the new debt agreement entered into to
finance the VIP Acquisition as well as higher amounts outstanding
on the revolving credit facility during the quarter compared to the
three months ended March 31, 2017.</font></font></p>
<p style=
"margin:0pt 0pt 6.6pt;color:#000000;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;font-size: 10pt;">
<font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;color:#0563C1;">
<font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;font-weight:bold;font-style:italic;color:#000000;">
Other income (expense), net</font></font></p>
<p style=
"margin:0pt 0pt 12pt;color:#000000;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;font-size: 10pt;">
<font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;color:#0563C1;">
<font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;color:#000000;">
Other income (expense), net,&nbsp;&nbsp;increased $93,000 to
$96,000 in the three months ended March 31, 2018 compared to $3,000
for the three months ended March 31, 2017.&nbsp;&nbsp;This is due
to a fair value adjustment to the contingent notes entered into as
part of the VIP Acquisition.&nbsp;</font></font></p>
<p style=
"margin:0pt;color:#000000;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;font-size: 10pt;">
<font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;color:#0563C1;">
<font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;font-weight:bold;font-style:italic;color:#000000;">
Pre-tax net income (loss)</font></font></p>
<p style=
"margin:0pt;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;font-size: 10pt;">
<font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;color:#0563C1;">
<font style="display:inline;">&nbsp;</font></font></p>
<p style=
"margin:0pt 0pt 12pt;color:#00100B;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;font-size: 10pt;">
<font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;color:#0563C1;">
<font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;color:#00100B;">
As</font> <font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;color:#000000;">
a result of the factors above, pre-tax net income (loss) decreased
$9.3 million to a loss of $5.0 million for the three months ended
March 31, 2018 compared to pre-tax net income of $4.3 million for
the three months ended March 31, 2017.</font><font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;color:#00100B;">&nbsp;</font></font></p>
<p style=
"margin:0pt;color:#000000;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;font-size: 10pt;">
<font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;color:#0563C1;">
<font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;font-weight:bold;font-style:italic;color:#000000;">
Provision for income taxes</font></font></p>
<p style=
"margin:0pt;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;font-size: 10pt;">
<font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;color:#0563C1;">
<font style="display:inline;">&nbsp;</font></font></p>
<p style=
"margin:0pt 0pt 12pt;color:#000000;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;font-size: 10pt;">
<font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;color:#0563C1;">
<font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;color:#00100B;">
Our effective tax rate, giving effect to the non-controlling
interest, a partnership for income tax purposes, was 21.2% for the
three months ended March 31, 2018, with a tax benefit of $1.1
million.&nbsp;&nbsp;Prior to our IPO in July 2017, the Company was
treated as a partnership, thus did not have income tax
expense.</font></font></p>
<p style=
"margin:0pt 0pt 12pt;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;font-weight:bold;font-style:italic;font-size: 10pt;">
<font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;color:#0563C1;">
<font style="display:inline;">Non-GAAP Financial
Measures</font></font></p>
<p style=
"margin:0pt 0pt 12pt;border-bottom:1pt none #D9D9D9 ;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;font-size: 10pt;">
<font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;color:#0563C1;">
<font style="display:inline;">EBITDA and Adjusted EBITDA are
non-GAAP financial measures. EBITDA represents net income before
interest, income taxes and depreciation and amortization. Adjusted
EBITDA represents EBITDA plus acquisition costs, stock based
compensation expense, purchase accounting&nbsp;&nbsp;inventory
adjustment, fair value adjustment to contingent consideration, new
clinic launch expenses, integration and costs of discontinued
clinics, and management fees. Adjusted EBITDA adjusts for
transactions that management does not believe are representative of
our core ongoing business. Adjusted EBITDA is utilized by
management: (i)&nbsp;as a factor in evaluating management’s
performance when determining incentive compensation and
(ii)&nbsp;to evaluate the effectiveness of our business
strategies.</font></font></p>
<p style=
"margin:0pt 0pt 12pt;border-top:1pt none #D9D9D9 ;border-bottom:1pt none #D9D9D9 ;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;font-size: 10pt;">
<font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;color:#0563C1;">
<font style="display:inline;">The Company presents EBITDA because
it is a necessary component for computing Adjusted EBITDA. We
believe that the use of EBITDA and Adjusted EBITDA provides an
additional tool for investors to use in evaluating
ongoing</font></font></p>
</div>
<div style=
"margin-left:10.2941176470588%;margin-right:10.2941176470588%;">
<div style="width:100%">
<p style=
"margin:24pt 0pt 0pt;text-align:center;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;font-size: 10pt;">
<font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;color:#0563C1;">
<font style="display:inline;">31</font></font></p>
</div>
</div>
<div style=
"margin-left:10.2941176470588%;margin-right:10.2941176470588%;">
<hr align="center" style=
'background-color:#000000; border-width:0; color:#000000; height:2pt; lineheight:0; width:100%;' />

<p style="page-break-after:always"><font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;color:#0563C1;">
&nbsp;</font></p>
</div>
<div style=
"margin-left:10.2941176470588%;margin-right:10.2941176470588%;">
<div style="width:100%">
<p style=
"margin:0pt 0pt 30pt;color:#0563C1;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;font-size: 10pt;">
<font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;color:#0563C1;">
<a href="#TOC"><font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;color:#0563C1;">
Table of Contents</font></a></font></p>
</div>
</div>
<div style=
"margin-left:10.2941176470588%;margin-right:10.2941176470588%;">
<p style=
"margin:0pt 0pt 12pt;border-top:1pt none #D9D9D9 ;border-bottom:1pt none #D9D9D9 ;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;font-size: 10pt;">
<font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;color:#0563C1;">
<font style="display:inline;">operating results and trends. In
addition, you should be aware when evaluating EBITDA and Adjusted
EBITDA that in the future we may incur expenses similar to those
excluded when calculating these measures. Our presentation of these
measures should not be construed as an inference that our future
results will be unaffected by these or other unusual or
non-recurring items. Our computation of EBITDA and Adjusted EBITDA
may not be comparable to other similarly titled measures computed
by other companies, because all companies do not calculate EBITDA
and Adjusted EBITDA in the same manner.</font></font></p>
<p style=
"margin:0pt 0pt 12pt;border-top:1pt none #D9D9D9 ;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;font-size: 10pt;">
<font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;color:#0563C1;">
<font style="display:inline;">Our management does not, and you
should not, consider EBITDA or Adjusted EBITDA in isolation or as
an alternative to financial measures determined in accordance with
GAAP. The principal limitation of EBITDA and Adjusted EBITDA is
that they exclude significant expenses and income that are required
by GAAP to be recorded in our financial statements. Some of these
limitations are:</font></font></p>
<div style="width:100%">
<table style="width:100%;" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0">
<tr>
<td style="width:0pt;">
<p style="width:0pt;font-size:0pt;"></p>
</td>
<td valign="top" align="left" style="width: 17.00pt;">
<p style=
"border-bottom:1pt none #D9D9D9 ;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;font-size: 10pt;margin:0pt 0pt 6pt;">
<font style=
"margin:0pt 0pt 6pt;font-family:Symbol;border-bottom:1pt none #D9D9D9;font-size:10pt;;">
·</font></p>
</td>
<td style="width:1pt;">
<p style="width:1pt;width:1pt;font-size:0pt;"></p>
</td>
<td align="left" valign="top">
<p style=
"border-bottom:1pt none #D9D9D9 ;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;font-size: 10pt;margin:0pt 0pt 6pt;">
<font style="display:inline;color:#000000;">EBITDA does not reflect
our cash expenditures, or future requirements, for capital
expenditures or contractual commitments;</font></p>
</td>
</tr>
</table>
</div>
<div style="width:100%">
<table style="width:100%;" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0">
<tr>
<td style="width:0pt;">
<p style="width:0pt;font-size:0pt;"></p>
</td>
<td valign="top" align="left" style="width: 17.00pt;">
<p style=
"border-top:1pt none #D9D9D9 ;border-bottom:1pt none #D9D9D9 ;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;font-size: 10pt;margin:0pt 0pt 6pt;">
<font style=
"margin:0pt 0pt 6pt;font-family:Symbol;border-top:1pt none #D9D9D9;border-bottom:1pt none #D9D9D9;font-size:10pt;;">
·</font></p>
</td>
<td style="width:1pt;">
<p style="width:1pt;width:1pt;font-size:0pt;"></p>
</td>
<td align="left" valign="top">
<p style=
"border-top:1pt none #D9D9D9 ;border-bottom:1pt none #D9D9D9 ;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;font-size: 10pt;margin:0pt 0pt 6pt;">
<font style="display:inline;color:#000000;">EBITDA does not reflect
changes in, or cash requirements for, our working capital
needs;</font></p>
</td>
</tr>
</table>
</div>
<div style="width:100%">
<table style="width:100%;" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0">
<tr>
<td style="width:0pt;">
<p style="width:0pt;font-size:0pt;"></p>
</td>
<td valign="top" align="left" style="width: 17.00pt;">
<p style=
"border-top:1pt none #D9D9D9 ;border-bottom:1pt none #D9D9D9 ;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;font-size: 10pt;margin:0pt 0pt 6pt;">
<font style=
"margin:0pt 0pt 6pt;font-family:Symbol;border-top:1pt none #D9D9D9;border-bottom:1pt none #D9D9D9;font-size:10pt;;">
·</font></p>
</td>
<td style="width:1pt;">
<p style="width:1pt;width:1pt;font-size:0pt;"></p>
</td>
<td align="left" valign="top">
<p style=
"border-top:1pt none #D9D9D9 ;border-bottom:1pt none #D9D9D9 ;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;font-size: 10pt;margin:0pt 0pt 6pt;">
<font style="display:inline;color:#000000;">EBITDA does not reflect
the interest expenses, or the cash requirements necessary to
service interest or principal payments, on our debts;</font></p>
</td>
</tr>
</table>
</div>
<div style="width:100%">
<table style="width:100%;" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0">
<tr>
<td style="width:0pt;">
<p style="width:0pt;font-size:0pt;"></p>
</td>
<td valign="top" align="left" style="width: 17.00pt;">
<p style=
"border-top:1pt none #D9D9D9 ;border-bottom:1pt none #D9D9D9 ;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;font-size: 10pt;margin:0pt 0pt 6pt;">
<font style=
"margin:0pt 0pt 6pt;font-family:Symbol;border-top:1pt none #D9D9D9;border-bottom:1pt none #D9D9D9;font-size:10pt;;">
·</font></p>
</td>
<td style="width:1pt;">
<p style="width:1pt;width:1pt;font-size:0pt;"></p>
</td>
<td align="left" valign="top">
<p style=
"border-top:1pt none #D9D9D9 ;border-bottom:1pt none #D9D9D9 ;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;font-size: 10pt;margin:0pt 0pt 6pt;">
<font style="display:inline;color:#000000;">although depreciation
and amortization are non-cash charges, the assets being depreciated
and amortized will often have to be replaced in the future, and
Adjusted EBITDA does not reflect any cash requirements for such
replacements;</font></p>
</td>
</tr>
</table>
</div>
<div style="width:100%">
<table style="width:100%;" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0">
<tr>
<td style="width:0pt;">
<p style="width:0pt;font-size:0pt;"></p>
</td>
<td valign="top" align="left" style="width: 17.00pt;">
<p style=
"border-top:1pt none #D9D9D9 ;border-bottom:1pt none #D9D9D9 ;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;font-size: 10pt;margin:0pt 0pt 6pt;">
<font style=
"margin:0pt 0pt 6pt;font-family:Symbol;border-top:1pt none #D9D9D9;border-bottom:1pt none #D9D9D9;font-size:10pt;;">
·</font></p>
</td>
<td style="width:1pt;">
<p style="width:1pt;width:1pt;font-size:0pt;"></p>
</td>
<td align="left" valign="top">
<p style=
"border-top:1pt none #D9D9D9 ;border-bottom:1pt none #D9D9D9 ;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;font-size: 10pt;margin:0pt 0pt 6pt;">
<font style="display:inline;color:#000000;">Adjusted EBITDA does
not reflect the impact of certain cash charges resulting from
matters we consider not to be indicative of our ongoing core
operations; and</font></p>
</td>
</tr>
</table>
</div>
<div style="width:100%">
<table style="width:100%;" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0">
<tr>
<td style="width:0pt;">
<p style="width:0pt;font-size:0pt;"></p>
</td>
<td valign="top" align="left" style="width: 17.00pt;">
<p style=
"border-top:1pt none #D9D9D9 ;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;font-size: 10pt;margin:0pt 0pt 12pt;">
<font style=
"margin:0pt 0pt 12pt;font-family:Symbol;border-top:1pt none #D9D9D9;font-size:10pt;;">
·</font></p>
</td>
<td style="width:1pt;">
<p style="width:1pt;width:1pt;font-size:0pt;"></p>
</td>
<td align="left" valign="top">
<p style=
"border-top:1pt none #D9D9D9 ;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;font-size: 10pt;margin:0pt 0pt 12pt;">
<font style="display:inline;color:#000000;">Other companies in our
industry may calculate Adjusted EBITDA differently than we do,
limiting its usefulness as a comparative measure.</font></p>
</td>
</tr>
</table>
</div>
<p style=
"margin:0pt 0pt 12pt;border-bottom:1pt none #D9D9D9 ;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;font-size: 10pt;">
<font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;color:#0563C1;">
<font style="display:inline;">Because of these limitations, EBITDA
and Adjusted EBITDA should not be considered in isolation or as a
substitute for performance measures calculated in accordance with
GAAP. We compensate for these limitations by relying primarily on
our GAAP results and using EBITDA and Adjusted EBITDA only
supplementally. You should review the reconciliations of net (loss)
income to EBITDA and Adjusted EBITDA below and not rely on any
single financial measure to evaluate our
business.</font></font></p>
<p style=
"margin:0pt 0pt 12pt;border-top:1pt none #D9D9D9 ;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;font-size: 10pt;">
<font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;color:#0563C1;">
<font style="display:inline;">The following table reconciles net
(loss) income to EBITDA and Adjusted EBITDA for the periods
presented.</font></font></p>
<div style="width:100%;">
<table cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" align="center" style=
"border-collapse:collapse;width: 100.00%;">
<tr>
<td valign="bottom" style=
"width:66.86%;border-top:1pt none #D9D9D9 ;border-left:1pt none #D9D9D9 ;border-bottom:1pt none #D9D9D9 ;border-right:1pt none #D9D9D9 ;height:1.00pt;padding:0pt;">
<p style=
"margin:0pt 0pt 0.05pt;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;height:1.00pt;overflow:hidden;font-size:0pt;">
<font style="display:inline;font-size:1pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
</td>
<td valign="bottom" style=

<p style=
"margin:0pt 0pt 0.05pt;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;height:1.00pt;overflow:hidden;font-size:0pt;">

</td>

</td>

</td>
<td valign="bottom" style=

<td colspan="5" valign="bottom" style=

<p style=
"margin:0pt 0pt 0.05pt;text-align:center;color:#000000;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;font-size: 8pt;">
<font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;font-weight:bold;color:#000000;font-size:8pt;">
For the three months ended</font></p>
</td>
<td valign="bottom" style=
"width:02.14%;border-top:1pt none #D9D9D9 ;border-left:1pt none #D9D9D9 ;border-bottom:1pt none #D9D9D9 ;border-right:1pt none #D9D9D9 ;background-color: #auto;padding:0pt;">
<p style=
"margin:0pt 0pt 0.05pt;color:#000000;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;font-size: 8pt;">
<font style="display:inline;font-size:8pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td valign="bottom" style=
"width:66.86%;border-top:1pt none #D9D9D9 ;border-left:1pt none #D9D9D9 ;border-bottom:1pt none #D9D9D9 ;border-right:1pt none #D9D9D9 ;background-color: #auto;padding:0pt;">
<p style=

<td valign="bottom" style=
"width:02.14%;border-top:1pt none #D9D9D9 ;border-left:1pt none #D9D9D9 ;border-bottom:1pt none #D9D9D9 ;border-right:1pt none #D9D9D9 ;padding:0pt;">

<div style="width:100%">
<p style=
"margin:24pt 0pt 0pt;text-align:center;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;font-size: 10pt;">
<font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;color:#0563C1;">
<font style="display:inline;">32</font></font></p>

<div style=
"margin-left:10.2941176470588%;margin-right:10.2941176470588%;">
<hr align="center" style=
'background-color:#000000; border-width:0; color:#000000; height:2pt; lineheight:0; width:100%;' />

<p style="page-break-after:always"><font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;color:#0563C1;">
&nbsp;</font></p>
</div>
<div style=
"margin-left:10.2941176470588%;margin-right:10.2941176470588%;">
<div style="width:100%">
<p style=
"margin:0pt 0pt 30pt;color:#0563C1;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;font-size: 10pt;">
<font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;color:#0563C1;">
<a href="#TOC"><font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;color:#0563C1;">
Table of Contents</font></a></font></p>
</div>
</div>
<div style=
"margin-left:10.2941176470588%;margin-right:10.2941176470588%;">
<p style=
"margin:0pt;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;font-size: 10pt;">
</p>
<div style="width:100%">
<table style="width:100%;" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0">
<tr>
<td style="width:0pt;">
<p style="width:0pt;font-size:0pt;"></p>
</td>
<td valign="top" align="left" style="width: 18.00pt;">
<p style=
"border-bottom:1pt none #D9D9D9 ;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;font-size: 10pt;margin:0pt 0pt 6pt;">
<sup style=
"margin:0pt 0pt 6pt;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;font-size:12pt;border-bottom:1pt none #D9D9D9;;">
(1)</sup></p>
</td>
<td style="width:0pt;">
<p style="width:0pt;width:0pt;font-size:0pt;"></p>
</td>
<td align="left" valign="top">
<p style=
"border-bottom:1pt none #D9D9D9 ;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;font-size: 10pt;margin:0pt 0pt 6pt;">
<font style="display:inline;color:#000000;">Acquisition costs
relating to our acquisition of VIP, which was completed during the
three months ended March 31, 2018.</font></p>
</td>
</tr>
</table>
</div>
<div style="width:100%">
<table style="width:100%;" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0">
<tr>
<td style="width:0pt;">
<p style="width:0pt;font-size:0pt;"></p>
</td>
<td valign="top" align="left" style="width: 18.00pt;">
<p style=
"border-top:1pt none #D9D9D9 ;border-bottom:1pt none #D9D9D9 ;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;font-size: 10pt;margin:0pt 0pt 6pt;">
<sup style=
"margin:0pt 0pt 6pt;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;font-size:12pt;border-top:1pt none #D9D9D9;border-bottom:1pt none #D9D9D9;;">
(2)</sup></p>
</td>
<td style="width:0pt;">
<p style="width:0pt;width:0pt;font-size:0pt;"></p>
</td>
<td align="left" valign="top">
<p style=
"border-top:1pt none #D9D9D9 ;border-bottom:1pt none #D9D9D9 ;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;font-size: 10pt;margin:0pt 0pt 6pt;">
<font style="display:inline;color:#000000;">Represents annual fees
paid pursuant to our management agreements with Eos, Highland and
Labore. The management agreements terminated in connection with our
initial public offering;</font></p>
</td>
</tr>
</table>
</div>
<div style="width:100%">
<table style="width:100%;" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0">
<tr>
<td style="width:0pt;">
<p style="width:0pt;font-size:0pt;"></p>
</td>
<td valign="top" align="left" style="width: 18.00pt;">
<p style=
"border-top:1pt none #D9D9D9 ;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;font-size: 10pt;margin:0pt 0pt 6pt;">
<sup style=
"margin:0pt 0pt 6pt;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;font-size:12pt;border-top:1pt none #D9D9D9;;">
(3)</sup></p>
</td>
<td style="width:0pt;">
<p style="width:0pt;width:0pt;font-size:0pt;"></p>
</td>
<td align="left" valign="top">
<p style=
"border-top:1pt none #D9D9D9 ;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;font-size: 10pt;margin:0pt 0pt 6pt;">
<font style="display:inline;color:#000000;">Clinic launch expenses
represent the nonrecurring costs to open new veterinary wellness
centers, primarily employee costs, training, marketing, and rent
prior to opening for business.</font></p>
</td>
</tr>
</table>
</div>
<p style=
"margin:0pt;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;font-size: 10pt;">
<font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;color:#0563C1;">
<font style="display:inline;">&nbsp;</font></font></p>
<p style=
"margin:0pt 0pt 12pt;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;font-weight:bold;font-size: 10pt;">
<font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;color:#0563C1;">
<font style="display:inline;">Financial Condition, Liquidity, and
Capital Resources</font></font></p>
<p style=
"margin:0pt 0pt 12pt;border-bottom:1pt none #D9D9D9 ;color:#000000;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;font-size: 10pt;">
<font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;color:#0563C1;">
<font style="display:inline;color:#000000;">Historically, our
primary sources of liquidity have been cash flows from operations,
borrowings, and equity contributions. As of March 31, 2018 and
December 31, 2017, our cash and cash equivalents were $4.7 million
and $37.9 million respectively. As of March 31, 2018, we had $43.1
million outstanding under a revolving credit facility, $75 million
under a term loan, $10 million due under a guaranteed note, and
$1.9 million outstanding under a mortgage.&nbsp;&nbsp;The debt
agreements bear interest at rates between 4.35% and
6.98%.</font></font></p>
<p style=
"margin:0pt 0pt 12pt;border-top:1pt none #D9D9D9 ;border-bottom:1pt none #D9D9D9 ;color:#000000;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;font-size: 10pt;">
<font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;color:#0563C1;">
<font style="display:inline;color:#000000;">Our primary cash needs
are for working capital. Our maintenance capital expenditures have
typically been less than 1.0% of net sales, but we may make
additional capital expenditures as necessary to support our growth,
such as the investment in additional veterinary clinics. Our
primary working capital requirements are to carry inventory and
receivable levels necessary to support our increasing net sales.
Fluctuations in working capital are primarily driven by the timing
of new product launches and seasonal retailer demand. As of March
31, 2018 and December 31, 2017, we had working capital (current
assets less current liabilities) of $85.2 million and $90.7
million, respectively.</font></font></p>
<p style=
"margin:0pt 0pt 12pt;border-top:1pt none #D9D9D9 ;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;font-size: 10pt;">
<font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;color:#0563C1;">
<font style="display:inline;color:#000000;">We believe that our
operating cash flow, cash on hand, and debt proceeds from our
borrowings under our credit facility will be adequate to meet our
operating, investing, and financing needs for the foreseeable
future. To the extent additional funds are necessary to meet
long-term liquidity needs as we continue to execute our business
strategy, we anticipate that they will be obtained through the
incurrence of additional indebtedness, additional equity financings
or a combination of these potential sources of funds, although we
can provide no assurance that these sources of funding will be
available on reasonable terms.</font></font></p>
<p style=
"margin:0pt 0pt 6.6pt;color:#000000;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;font-size: 10pt;">
<font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;color:#0563C1;">
<font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;font-weight:bold;color:#000000;">
Cash Flows</font></font></p>
<p style=
"margin:0pt 0pt 6pt;color:#000000;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;font-size: 10pt;">
<font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;color:#0563C1;">
<font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;font-weight:bold;font-style:italic;color:#000000;">
Cash used in Operating Activities</font></font></p>
<p style=
"margin:0pt 0pt 12pt;color:#000000;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;font-size: 10pt;">
<font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;color:#0563C1;">
<font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;color:#000000;">
Net cash used in operating activities was $38.4 million for the
three months ended March 31, 2018, compared to cash used in
operating activities of $16.9 million for the three months ended
March 31, 2017. The change in operating cash flows primarily
reflects increased use of cash for working capital and the net loss
sustained in the quarter.&nbsp;&nbsp;Working capital uses are
driven by increased accounts receivable resulting from our
growing</font> <font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;">sales</font><font style="display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;color:#000000;">.&nbsp;&nbsp;Net
changes in assets and liabilities accounted for $36.5 million in
cash used in operating activities for the three months ended March
31, 2018 compared to $22.0 million of cash used in operating
activities for the three months ended March 31,
2017.</font></font></p>
<p style=
"margin:0pt 0pt 6.6pt;color:#000000;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;font-size: 10pt;">
<font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;color:#0563C1;">
<font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;font-weight:bold;font-style:italic;color:#000000;">
Cash used in Investing Activities</font></font></p>
<p style=
"margin:0pt 0pt 12pt;color:#000000;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;font-size: 10pt;">
<font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;color:#0563C1;">
<font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;color:#000000;">
Net cash used in</font> <font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;">investing</font>
<font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;color:#000000;">
activities was $94.2 million for the three months ended March 31,
2018, compared to $0.5 million for the three months ended March 31,
2017. The increase in net cash used in investing activities is a
result of the VIP Acquisition as well as growth in capital
expenditures.</font></font></p>
<p style=
"margin:0pt 0pt 6.6pt;color:#000000;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;font-size: 10pt;">
<font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;color:#0563C1;">
<font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;font-weight:bold;font-style:italic;color:#000000;">
Cash provided by Financing Activities</font></font></p>
<p style=
"margin:0pt 0pt 12pt;color:#000000;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;font-weight:bold;font-style:italic;font-size: 10pt;">
<font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;color:#0563C1;">
<font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;color:#000000;">
Net cash provided by financing activities was $99.4 million for the
three months ended March 31, 2018 compared to $18.0 million in net
cash provided by financing activities for the three months ended
March 31, 2017.&nbsp;&nbsp;This increase in cash provided by
financing activities is primarily driven by the Company’s new debt
taken out to finance the VIP Acquisition.</font></font></p>
<p style=
"margin:0pt;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;font-size: 10pt;">
</p>
</div>
<div style=
"margin-left:10.2941176470588%;margin-right:10.2941176470588%;">
<div style="width:100%">
<p style=
"margin:24pt 0pt 0pt;text-align:center;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;font-size: 10pt;">
<font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;color:#0563C1;">
<font style="display:inline;">33</font></font></p>
</div>
</div>
<div style=
"margin-left:10.2941176470588%;margin-right:10.2941176470588%;">
<hr align="center" style=
'background-color:#000000; border-width:0; color:#000000; height:2pt; lineheight:0; width:100%;' />

<p style="page-break-after:always"><font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;color:#0563C1;">
&nbsp;</font></p>
</div>
<div style=
"margin-left:10.2941176470588%;margin-right:10.2941176470588%;">
<div style="width:100%">
<p style=
"margin:0pt 0pt 30pt;color:#0563C1;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;font-size: 10pt;">
<font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;color:#0563C1;">
<a href="#TOC"><font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;color:#0563C1;">
Table of Contents</font></a></font></p>
</div>
</div>
<div style=
"margin-left:10.2941176470588%;margin-right:10.2941176470588%;">
<p style=
"margin:0pt;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;font-size: 10pt;">
</p>
<p style=
"margin:0pt 0pt 6pt;color:#00100B;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;font-weight:bold;font-style:italic;font-size: 10pt;">
<font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;color:#0563C1;">
<font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;color:#000000;">
Description of Indebtedness</font></font></p>
<p style=
"margin:0pt 0pt 12pt 18pt;text-indent: -18pt;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;font-size: 10pt;">
<font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;color:#0563C1;">
<font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;font-weight:bold;font-style:italic;">
A&amp;R Credit Agreement</font></font></p>
<p style=
"margin:0pt;text-align:justify;text-justify:inter-ideograph;border-bottom:1pt none #D9D9D9 ;color:#000000;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;font-size: 10pt;">
<font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;color:#0563C1;">
<font style="display:inline;">In connection with the VIP
Acquisition, the Company amended and restated its existing
revolving credit agreement (the “A&amp;R Credit Agreement”) on
January 17, 2018.&nbsp;&nbsp;T</font><font style=
"display:inline;color:#000000;">he A&amp;R Credit
Agreement&nbsp;provides for a secured revolving credit facility of
$50 million in the aggregate, at either LIBOR or Base (prime)
interest rates plus an applicable margin.&nbsp;&nbsp;The A&amp;R
Credit Agreement matures on January 16, 2023.
&nbsp;</font></font></p>
<p style=
"margin:0pt;text-align:justify;text-justify:inter-ideograph;border-top:1pt none #D9D9D9 ;border-bottom:1pt none #D9D9D9 ;color:#000000;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;font-size: 10pt;">
<font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;color:#0563C1;">
<font style=
"display:inline;color:#000000;">&nbsp;&nbsp;</font></font></p>
<p style=
"margin:0pt;text-align:justify;text-justify:inter-ideograph;border-top:1pt none #D9D9D9 ;color:#000000;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;font-size: 10pt;">
<font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;color:#0563C1;">
<font style="display:inline;color:#000000;">All obligations under
the A&amp;R Credit Agreement are unconditionally guaranteed by
Holdco and each of its domestic wholly-owned subsidiaries and,
subject to certain exceptions, each of its material current and
future domestic wholly-owned subsidiaries. All obligations under
the A&amp;R Credit Agreement, and the guarantees of those
obligations, are secured by substantially all of the assets of each
borrower and guarantor under the A&amp;R Credit Agreement, subject
to certain exceptions.</font></font></p>
<p style=
"margin:0pt;text-align:justify;text-justify:inter-ideograph;border-bottom:1pt none #D9D9D9 ;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;font-size: 10pt;">
<font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;color:#0563C1;">
<font style="display:inline;">&nbsp;</font></font></p>
<p style=
"margin:0pt;text-align:justify;text-justify:inter-ideograph;border-top:1pt none #D9D9D9 ;border-bottom:1pt none #D9D9D9 ;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;font-size: 10pt;">
<font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;color:#0563C1;">
<font style="display:inline;">Also in connection with the closing
of the VIP Acquisition, the Company entered into a term loan credit
agreement (the “Term Loan Credit Agreement”).&nbsp;</font>
<font style="display:inline;color:#000000;">The Term Loan Credit
Agreement&nbsp;provides for a secured term loan credit facility of
$75 million in aggregate at either LIBOR or Base (prime) interest
rates plus an applicable margin.&nbsp;&nbsp;The Term Loan Credit
Agreement requires quarterly principal payments, with the full
balance due on January 17, 2023.</font></font></p>
<p style=
"margin:0pt;border-top:1pt none #D9D9D9 ;border-bottom:1pt none #D9D9D9 ;color:#00100B;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;font-size: 10pt;">
<font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;color:#0563C1;">
<font style="display:inline;">&nbsp;</font></font></p>
<p style=
"margin:0pt 0pt 12pt;border-top:1pt none #D9D9D9 ;border-bottom:1pt none #D9D9D9 ;color:#00100B;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;font-size: 10pt;">
<font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;color:#0563C1;">
<font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;color:#00100B;">
As of March 31, 2018, the Company had $43 million outstanding under
the A&amp;R Credit Agreement and $75 million under the Term Loan
Credit Agreement. The interest rate on the A&amp;R Credit Agreement
was 4.75% as a Base Rate loan, the interest rate on the Term Loan
Credit Agreement was 6.97% as a LIBOR rate loan.&nbsp;&nbsp;The
A&amp;R Credit Agreement contains a lockbox
mechanism.</font></font></p>
<p style=
"margin:0pt 0pt 12pt;border-top:1pt none #D9D9D9 ;color:#00100B;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;font-size: 10pt;">
<font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;color:#0563C1;">
<font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;color:#00100B;">
The A&amp;R Credit Agreement and Term Loan Credit Agreement
contains certain covenants and restrictions including a fixed
charge coverage ratio and a minimum EBITDA target and is secured by
collateral consisting of a percentage of eligible accounts
receivable, inventories, and machinery and equipment. As of March
31, 2018, the Company was in compliance with these
covenants.</font></font></p>
<p style=
"margin:0pt 0pt 12pt 18pt;text-indent: -18pt;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;font-size: 10pt;">
<font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;color:#0563C1;">
<font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;font-weight:bold;font-style:italic;">
Prior Credit Agreement</font></font></p>
<p style=
"margin:0pt 0pt 12pt;color:#00100B;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;font-size: 10pt;">
<font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;color:#0563C1;">
<font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;color:#00100B;">
The Company entered</font> <font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;">into</font>
<font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;color:#00100B;">
a previous credit agreement (“Prior Credit Agreement”) on December
21, 2016.&nbsp;&nbsp;The Prior Credit Agreement provided for
secured financing of $50,000&nbsp;thousand in aggregate at either
LIBOR or Base (prime) interest rates plus an applicable margin,
consisting of:</font></font></p>
<p style=
"margin:0pt;text-indent:36pt;text-align:justify;text-justify:inter-ideograph;color:#00100B;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;font-size: 10pt;">
<font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;color:#0563C1;">
<font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;color:#00100B;">
(i) $45,000 thousand revolving credit facility (“Prior Revolver”)
maturing on December 16, 2019; and</font></font></p>
<p style=
"margin:0pt 4.5pt 0pt 0pt;text-indent:36pt;text-align:justify;text-justify:inter-ideograph;color:#00100B;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;font-size: 10pt;">
<font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;color:#0563C1;">
<font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;color:#00100B;">
(ii) $5,000&nbsp;thousand term loan (“Prior Term Loans”), requiring
equal amortizing payments for 24 months.</font></font></p>
<p style=
"margin:0pt 4.5pt 0pt 0pt;text-indent:27pt;text-align:justify;text-justify:inter-ideograph;color:#00100B;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;font-size: 10pt;">
<font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;color:#0563C1;">
<font style="display:inline;">&nbsp;</font></font></p>
<p style=
"margin:0pt 0pt 12pt;color:#00100B;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;font-size: 10pt;">
<font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;color:#0563C1;">
<font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;color:#00100B;">
As of December 31, 2017, the Company had fully repaid the Prior
Term Loans and had $15,325&nbsp;thousand outstanding under the
Prior Revolver. The interest</font> <font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;">rate</font>
<font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;color:#00100B;">
on the Prior Revolver was 5.00%&nbsp;as a Base Rate
loan.&nbsp;&nbsp;All amounts outstanding under the Prior Revolver
were repaid in connection with the A&amp;R Credit
Agreement.</font></font></p>
<p style=
"margin:0pt 0pt 12pt 18pt;text-indent: -18pt;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;font-size: 10pt;">
<font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;color:#0563C1;">
<font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;font-weight:bold;font-style:italic;">
Other Debt</font></font></p>
<p style=
"margin:0pt 0pt 12pt;border-bottom:1pt none #D9D9D9 ;color:#00100B;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;font-size: 10pt;">
<font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;color:#0563C1;">
<font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;color:#00100B;">
The Company entered into a mortgage with a local bank to finance
$1.92 million of the purchase price of a commercial building in
Eagle, Idaho, in July 2017.&nbsp;&nbsp;The mortgage bears interest
at a fixed rate of 4.35% and utilizes a 25 year amortization
schedule with a 10 year balloon payment of the balance due at that
time.&nbsp;</font></font></p>
<p style=
"margin:0pt 0pt 12pt;border-top:1pt none #D9D9D9 ;color:#00100B;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;font-size: 10pt;">
<font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;color:#0563C1;">
<font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;color:#00100B;">
In connection with the VIP Acquisition, the Company entered into a
guarantee note which requires the Company to pay $10 million on
July 17, 2023.&nbsp;&nbsp;The note bears interest at a fixed 6.75%
and requires quarterly interest payments.&nbsp;</font></font></p>
<p style=
"margin:0pt;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;font-size: 10pt;">
</p>
</div>
<div style=
"margin-left:10.2941176470588%;margin-right:10.2941176470588%;">
<div style="width:100%">
<p style=
"margin:24pt 0pt 0pt;text-align:center;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;font-size: 10pt;">
<font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;color:#0563C1;">
<font style="display:inline;">34</font></font></p>
</div>
</div>
<div style=
"margin-left:10.2941176470588%;margin-right:10.2941176470588%;">
<hr align="center" style=
'background-color:#000000; border-width:0; color:#000000; height:2pt; lineheight:0; width:100%;' />

<p style="page-break-after:always"><font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;color:#0563C1;">
&nbsp;</font></p>
</div>
<div style=
"margin-left:10.2941176470588%;margin-right:10.2941176470588%;">
<div style="width:100%">
<p style=
"margin:0pt 0pt 30pt;color:#0563C1;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;font-size: 10pt;">
<font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;color:#0563C1;">
<a href="#TOC"><font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;color:#0563C1;">
Table of Contents</font></a></font></p>
</div>
</div>
<div style=
"margin-left:10.2941176470588%;margin-right:10.2941176470588%;">
<p style=
"margin:0pt;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;font-size: 10pt;">
</p>
<p style=
"margin:0pt;color:#000000;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;font-size: 10pt;">
<font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;color:#0563C1;">
<font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;font-weight:bold;color:#000000;">
Off-Balance Sheet Arrangements</font></font></p>
<p style=
"margin:0pt;color:#000000;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;font-size: 10pt;">
<font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;color:#0563C1;">
<font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;">&nbsp;</font></font></p>
<p style=
"margin:0pt;text-align:justify;text-justify:inter-ideograph;color:#00100B;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;font-size: 10pt;">
<font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;color:#0563C1;">
<font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;color:#00100B;">
We do not have any off-balance sheet
arrangements.</font></font></p>
<p style=
"margin:12pt 0pt;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;font-weight:bold;font-size: 10pt;">
<font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;color:#0563C1;">
<font style="display:inline;">Item&nbsp;3. Quantitative and
Qualitative Disclosures about Market Risk.<a name=
"Item3QuantitativeandQualitativeDisclosur" id=
"Item3QuantitativeandQualitativeDisclosur"></a></font></font></p>
<p style=
"margin:0pt 0pt 12pt;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;font-size: 10pt;">
<font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;color:#0563C1;">
<font style="display:inline;">We are exposed to certain market
risks arising from transactions in the normal course of our
business. Such risk is principally associated with interest rates.
We currently do not enter into derivatives or other financial
instruments for trading or speculative purposes.</font></font></p>
<p style=
"margin:0pt 0pt 6pt;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;font-weight:bold;font-style:italic;font-size: 10pt;">
<font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;color:#0563C1;">
<font style="display:inline;">Interest Rate Risk</font></font></p>
<p style=
"margin:0pt 0pt 12pt;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;font-size: 10pt;">
<font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;color:#0563C1;">
<font style="display:inline;">We are exposed to changes in interest
rates because the indebtedness incurred under our New Credit
Agreement is variable rate debt. Interest rate changes generally do
not affect the market value of our credit agreement but do affect
the amount of our interest payments and, therefore, our future
earnings and cash flows. As of March 31, 2018, we had variable rate
debt of approximately $118.1 million under our Revolver and Term
Loan. An increase of 1% would have increased our interest expense
for the three months ended March 31, 2018 by approximately $241
thousand.</font></font></p>
<p style=
"margin:0pt 0pt 12pt;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;font-weight:bold;font-size: 10pt;">
<font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;color:#0563C1;">
<font style="display:inline;">Item&nbsp;4.&nbsp;&nbsp;Controls and
Procedures.<a name="Item4ControlsandProcedures_127981" id=
"Item4ControlsandProcedures_127981"></a></font></font></p>
<p style=
"margin:0pt 0pt 12pt;line-height:normal;color:#000000;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;font-size: 10pt;">
<font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;color:#0563C1;">
<font style=
"display:inline;font-family:inherit;font-weight:bold;color:#000000;">
Internal Control over Financing Reporting</font></font></p>
<p style=
"margin:0pt 0pt 12pt;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;font-size: 10pt;">
<font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;color:#0563C1;">
<font style=
"font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;font-size:10pt;display:inline;">
As we are an emerging growth company and a newly public company, we
have not prepared a formal management’s report on internal control
over financial reporting, as would otherwise be required by Section
404 of the Sarbanes-Oxley Act of 2002, nor have we engaged an
independent registered public accounting firm to perform an audit
of our internal control over financial reporting as of any balance
sheet date in our condensed consolidated financial statements. Our
compliance with Section 404 of the Sarbanes-Oxley Act will first be
subject to management’s assessment regarding internal control over
financial reporting in connection with the filing of our Annual
Report on Form 10-K for the fiscal year ending December 31, 2018
and we will not be required to have an independent registered
public accounting firm attest to the effectiveness of our internal
control over financial reporting until the filing of our first
Annual Report on Form 10-K after we lose emerging growth company
status.&nbsp; We will remain an emerging growth company until the
earliest to occur of: the last day of the year in which we have
$1.07 billion or more in annual net sales, the date we qualify as a
“large accelerated filer,” with at least $700 million of equity
securities held by non-affiliates as of the last day of our most
recently completed second quarter; the issuance, in any three-year
period, by us of more than $1 billion in non-convertible debt
securities; or December 31, 2022.&nbsp; Accordingly, this Quarterly
Report on Form 10-Q does not include a report of management’s
assessment regarding internal control over financial reporting due
to a transition period established by rules of the SEC for newly
public companies.</font></font></p>
<p style=
"margin:0pt 0pt 12pt;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;font-weight:bold;font-size: 10pt;">
<font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;color:#0563C1;">
<font style="display:inline;">Evaluation of Disclosure Controls and
Procedures</font></font></p>
<p style=
"margin:0pt 0pt 12pt 1.45pt;border-bottom:1pt none #D9D9D9 ;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;font-size: 10pt;">
<font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;color:#0563C1;">
<font style="display:inline;">We maintain disclosure controls and
procedures (as that term is defined in
Rules&nbsp;13a‑15(e)&nbsp;and 15d‑15(e)&nbsp;under the Securities
Exchange Act of 1934, as amended (the "Exchange Act")) that are
designed to ensure that information required to be disclosed in our
reports under the Exchange Act is recorded, processed, summarized
and reported within the time periods specified in the SEC’s
rules&nbsp;and forms, and that such information is accumulated and
communicated to our management, including our Chief Executive
Officer and our Chief Financial Officer, as appropriate, to allow
timely decisions regarding required disclosures. Management
recognizes that any controls and procedures, no matter how well
designed and operated, can provide only reasonable assurance of
achieving the desired control objectives.</font></font></p>
<p style=
"margin:0pt 0pt 12pt 1.1pt;border-top:1pt none #D9D9D9 ;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;font-size: 10pt;">
<font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;color:#0563C1;">
<font style="display:inline;">Our management, with the
participation of our Chief Executive Officer and our Chief
Financial Officer, has evaluated the effectiveness of our
disclosure controls and procedures (as defined in
Rules&nbsp;13a‑15(e) and 15d‑15(e) under the Exchange Act), as of
the end of the period covered by this Quarterly Report on
Form&nbsp;10‑Q. Based on such evaluation, our Chief Executive
Officer and our Chief Financial Officer have concluded that as of
such date, our disclosure controls and procedures were
effective.</font></font></p>
<p style=
"margin:0pt;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;font-size: 10pt;">
</p>
</div>
<div style=
"margin-left:10.2941176470588%;margin-right:10.2941176470588%;">
<div style="width:100%">
<p style=
"margin:24pt 0pt 0pt;text-align:center;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;font-size: 10pt;">
<font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;color:#0563C1;">
<font style="display:inline;">35</font></font></p>
</div>
</div>
<div style=
"margin-left:10.2941176470588%;margin-right:10.2941176470588%;">
<hr align="center" style=
'background-color:#000000; border-width:0; color:#000000; height:2pt; lineheight:0; width:100%;' />

<p style="page-break-after:always"><font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;color:#0563C1;">
&nbsp;</font></p>
</div>
<div style=
"margin-left:10.2941176470588%;margin-right:10.2941176470588%;">
<div style="width:100%">
<p style=
"margin:0pt 0pt 30pt;color:#0563C1;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;font-size: 10pt;">
<font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;color:#0563C1;">
<a href="#TOC"><font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;color:#0563C1;">
Table of Contents</font></a></font></p>
</div>
</div>
<div style=
"margin-left:10.2941176470588%;margin-right:10.2941176470588%;">
<p style=
"margin:0pt;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;font-size: 10pt;">
</p>
<p style=
"margin:0pt 0pt 10pt;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;font-size: 10pt;">
<font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;color:#0563C1;">
<font style="display:inline;">As discussed in Note 2 to the
condensed consolidated financial statements included in this
Quarterly Report, we completed the acquisition of Community
Veterinary Clinics LLC and Subsidiaries d/b/a VIP Petcare “VIP”
from VIP Holdings, LLC, on January 17, 2018.&nbsp;&nbsp;As part of
our post-closing integration activities, we are engaged in the
process of assessing the internal controls of VIP.&nbsp;&nbsp;As
permitted by interpretive guidance for newly acquired businesses
issued by SEC staff, management has excluded VIP’s internal control
over financial reporting from the evaluation of the Company’s
effectiveness of its disclosure controls and procedures as of March
31, 2018.&nbsp; As outlined in Note 2 to the condensed consolidated
financial statements included in this quarterly report, total
assets of VIP included in the Company’s preliminary purchase price
allocation were approximately $28 million, and total VIP revenues
were approximately $17 million.</font></font></p>
<p style=
"margin:0pt 0pt 10pt;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;font-weight:bold;font-size: 10pt;">
<font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;color:#0563C1;">
<font style="display:inline;">Changes in Internal Control over
Financial Reporting</font></font></p>
<p style=
"margin:0pt;text-align:justify;text-justify:inter-ideograph;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;font-size: 10pt;">
<font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;color:#0563C1;">
<font style="display:inline;">Effective January 1, 2018, we adopted
Accounting Standards Codification 606,</font> <font style=
"display:inline;font-style:italic;">Revenue from Contracts with
Customers (“Topic 606”)</font><font style=
"display:inline;">.&nbsp;&nbsp;The adoption of Topic 606 had an
immaterial impact on our financial statements, however we
implemented certain changes to our revenue recognition related
control activities to enhance policies and periodic review
procedures to incorporate specific Topic 606
considerations.</font></font></p>
<p style=
"margin:0pt;text-align:justify;text-justify:inter-ideograph;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;font-size: 8pt;">
<font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;color:#0563C1;">
<font style=
"display:inline;font-size:8pt;">&nbsp;</font></font></p>
<p style=
"margin:0pt;text-align:justify;text-justify:inter-ideograph;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;font-size: 10pt;">
<font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;color:#0563C1;">
<font style="display:inline;">Additionally, in relation to the
closing of the VIP acquisition, noted in the section above,
management implemented changes to internal control activities,
including enhanced policies and review procedures pertaining to the
use of valuation service providers, opening balance sheet
determination, intercompany transactions, and segment
reporting.</font></font></p>
<p style=
"margin:0pt;text-align:justify;text-justify:inter-ideograph;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;font-size: 8pt;">
<font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;color:#0563C1;">
<font style=
"display:inline;font-size:8pt;">&nbsp;</font></font></p>
<p style=
"margin:0pt;text-align:justify;text-justify:inter-ideograph;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;font-size: 10pt;">
<font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;color:#0563C1;">
<font style="display:inline;">There were no other changes in our
internal control over financial reporting that occurred during our
fiscal quarter ended March 31, 2018, that has materially affected,
or is reasonably likely to materially affect, our internal control
over financial reporting.</font></font></p>
<p style=
"margin:0pt;text-align:justify;text-justify:inter-ideograph;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;font-size: 8pt;">
<font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;color:#0563C1;">
<font style=
"display:inline;font-size:8pt;">&nbsp;</font></font></p>
<p style=
"margin:0pt 0pt 8pt;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;font-size: 10pt;">
<font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;color:#0563C1;">
<font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;font-weight:bold;">

Statements</font></font></p>

“will,” “should,” “could” and similar
expressions.&nbsp;&nbsp;Examples of forward-looking statements
include, without limitation:</font></font></p>

<font style=

"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;">s good
faith belief as of that time with respect to future events, and are
subject to risks and uncertainties that could cause actual
performance or results to differ materially from those expressed in
or suggested by the forward-looking statements. Important factors
that could cause such differences include, but are not limited to,
factors discussed under the headings</font> <font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;color:#000000;">
“</font><font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;">Management</font><font style="display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;color:#000000;">’
</font><font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;">s
Discussion and Analysis of Financial Condition and Results of

"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;color:#000000;">”
