"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;">our
ability to successfully grow our business through acquisitions; our
ability to integrate, manage and expand VIP</font><font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;color:#000000;">’
</font><font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;">s
business; and our dependency on a limited number of customers; our
ability to implement our growth strategy effectively; our ability
to achieve or sustain profitability; competition from veterinarians
and others in our industry; reputational damage to our brands;
economic trends and spending on pets; the effectiveness of our
marketing and trade promotion programs; recalls or withdrawals of
our products or product liability claims; our ability to manage our
manufacturing and supply chain effectively; disruptions in our
manufacturing and distribution chains; our ability to introduce new
products and improve existing products; our failure to protect our
intellectual property; costs associated with
governmental</font></font></p>
</div>
<div style=
"margin-left:10.2941176470588%;margin-right:10.2941176470588%;">
<div style="width:100%">
<p style=
"margin:24pt 0pt 0pt;text-align:center;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;font-size: 10pt;">
<font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;color:#0563C1;">
<font style="display:inline;">36</font></font></p>
</div>

<div style=
"margin-left:10.2941176470588%;margin-right:10.2941176470588%;">
<hr align="center" style=
'background-color:#000000; border-width:0; color:#000000; height:2pt; lineheight:0; width:100%;' />

<p style="page-break-after:always"><font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;color:#0563C1;">
&nbsp;</font></p>
</div>
<div style=
"margin-left:10.2941176470588%;margin-right:10.2941176470588%;">
<div style="width:100%">
<p style=
"margin:0pt 0pt 30pt;color:#0563C1;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;font-size: 10pt;">
<font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;color:#0563C1;">
<a href="#TOC"><font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;color:#0563C1;">
Table of Contents</font></a></font></p>
</div>
</div>
<div style=
"margin-left:10.2941176470588%;margin-right:10.2941176470588%;">
<p style=
"margin:0pt 0pt 12pt;text-align:justify;text-justify:inter-ideograph;color:#000000;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;font-size: 10pt;">
<font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;color:#0563C1;">
<font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;">regulation;
our ability to keep and retain key employees; and the risks set
forth under the</font> <font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;color:#000000;">
“</font><font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;">Risk
Factors</font><font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;color:#000000;">”
 of our Annual Report on Form 10-K for the year ended December 31,
2017.&nbsp;</font></font></p>
<p style=
"margin:0pt 0pt 12pt;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;font-size: 10pt;">
<font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;color:#0563C1;">
<font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;">Additional
risks and uncertainties not currently known to us or that we
currently deem to be immaterial also may materially</font>
<font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;color:#000000;">
adversely</font> <font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;">affect
our business, financial condition or operating
results.&nbsp;&nbsp;The forward-looking statements speak only as of
the date on which they are made, and, except as required by law, we
undertake no obligation to update any forward-looking statement to
reflect events or circumstances after the date on which the
statement is made or to reflect the occurrence of unanticipated
events. In addition, we cannot assess the impact of each factor on
our business or the extent to which any factor, or combination of
factors, may cause actual results to differ materially from those
contained in any forward-looking statements. Consequently, you
should not place undue reliance on forward-looking
statements.</font></font></p>
<p style=
"margin:0pt;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;font-size: 1pt;">
<font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;color:#0563C1;">
<font style=
"display:inline;font-size:1pt;">&nbsp;</font></font></p>
<p style=
"margin:0pt 0pt 12pt;text-align:center;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;font-weight:bold;font-size: 10pt;">
<font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;color:#0563C1;">
<font style="display:inline;">PART&nbsp;II—OTHER
INFORMATION<a name="PARTIIOTHERINFORMATION_662269" id=
"PARTIIOTHERINFORMATION_662269"></a></font></font></p>
<p style=
"margin:0pt 0pt 12pt;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;font-weight:bold;font-size: 10pt;">
<font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;color:#0563C1;">
<font style="display:inline;">Item&nbsp;1. Legal
Proceedings.<a name="Item1LegalProceedings_197833" id=
"Item1LegalProceedings_197833"></a></font></font></p>
<p style=
"margin:0pt 0pt 12pt;color:#000000;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;font-size: 10pt;">
<font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;color:#0563C1;">
<font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;color:#000000;">
In May 2017, Bayer Healthcare LLC and its affiliates (collectively 
“Bayer”) filed suit in the United States District Court for the
District of Delaware, against CAP IM Supply, Inc. (“CAP IM”), our
supplier of Advecta&nbsp;3 and PetLock MAX, which we began to sell
in 2017 as our value-branded alternatives to Bayer’s K9 Advantix
II. Bayer alleges that Advecta&nbsp;3 and PetLock MAX infringe a
patent relating to K9 Advantix II.&nbsp;Bayer seeks unspecified
monetary damages and an injunction against future sales by CAP IM
of Advecta&nbsp;3 and PetLock MAX to the Company. Bayer has filed a
motion for preliminary injunction, though no hearing has been set
on that motion.&nbsp; Although we have not been named in the suit,
our license and supply agreement with CAP IM requires us to share
with CAP IM the payment of defense and settlement costs of such
litigation and allows us to control the defense of the
proceeding.&nbsp;CAP IM intends to vigorously defend this case and
we believe that CAP IM has meritorious defenses.&nbsp;However,
because of the inherent uncertainties of litigation, we can provide
no assurance of an outcome favorable to CAP IM and to us.&nbsp; The
case is presently scheduled for trial in February
2019.</font></font></p>
<p style=
"margin:0pt 0pt 12pt;border-bottom:1pt none #D9D9D9 ;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;font-size: 10pt;">
<font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;color:#0563C1;">
<font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;color:#000000;">
In April 2018, Med Vets, Inc. and&nbsp; Bay Medical Solutions Inc.,
filed suit in the United States District Court for the Northern
District of California against PetIQ, Inc. and VIP Petcare
Holdings, Inc. for alleged unlawful merger and other antitrust
violations.&nbsp; The plaintiffs seek unspecified monetary damages,
and various injunctive relief, including an order to require PetIQ
to divest its interests in VIP.&nbsp; We believe that the case
lacks merit and intend to vigorously defend the case and seek any
appropriate affirmative relief from the Court</font></font></p>
<p style=
"margin:0pt 0pt 12pt;border-top:1pt none #D9D9D9 ;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;font-size: 10pt;">
<font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;color:#0563C1;">
<font style="display:inline;">We are from time to time subject to,
and are presently involved in, litigation and other proceedings.
Other than the litigation described above, we believe that there
are no pending lawsuits or claims that, individually or in the
aggregate, may have a material adverse effect on our business,
financial condition or results of operations.</font></font></p>
<p style=
"margin:0pt 0pt 12pt;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;font-weight:bold;font-size: 10pt;">
<font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;color:#0563C1;">
<font style="display:inline;">Item&nbsp;1A. Risk Factors.<a name=
"Item1ARiskFactors_302582" id=
"Item1ARiskFactors_302582"></a></font></font></p>
<p style=
"margin:0pt 0pt 12pt;border-bottom:1pt none #D9D9D9 ;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;font-size: 10pt;">
<font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;color:#0563C1;">
<font style="display:inline;">There have been no material changes
to the risk factors disclosed in our annual report on Form 10-K for
the year ended December 31, 2017, except for (i) the addition of
the risk factors that immediately follow, and (ii) the revision of
the risk factors that follow them, which are revised and restated
in their entirety.</font></font></p>
<p style=
"margin:0pt 0pt 12pt;border-top:1pt none #D9D9D9 ;border-bottom:1pt none #D9D9D9 ;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;font-size: 10pt;">
<font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;color:#0563C1;">
<font style="display:inline;font-weight:bold;">Additional Risk
Factors</font></font></p>
<p style=
"margin:0pt 0pt 12pt;border-top:1pt none #D9D9D9 ;border-bottom:1pt none #D9D9D9 ;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;font-size: 10pt;">
<font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;color:#0563C1;">
<font style="display:inline;font-weight:bold;font-style:italic;">We
may be unsuccessful in opening new retail clinics, which could
adversely affect our growth</font></font></p>
<p style=
"margin:0pt 0pt 12pt;border-top:1pt none #D9D9D9 ;border-bottom:1pt none #D9D9D9 ;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;font-size: 10pt;">
<font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;color:#0563C1;">
<font style="display:inline;">One of the key means to achieving our
growth strategy is through opening new retail clinics, both
wellness centers and mobile clinics, and operating those on a
profitable basis.&nbsp;&nbsp;We opened 2 new wellness centers and
2&nbsp;district offices in the first quarter of 2018 and plan to
open an additional 20 wellness centers in the remainder of
2018.&nbsp; Our ability to open new retail clinics&nbsp;is
dependent upon a number of factors, many of which are beyond our
control, including our ability to:</font></font></p>
<div style="width:100%">
<table style="width:100%;" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0">
<tr>
<td style="width:18pt;">
<p style="width:18pt;font-size:0pt;"></p>
</td>
<td valign="top" align="left" style="width: 17.00pt;">
<p style=
"border-top:1pt none #D9D9D9 ;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;font-size: 10pt;margin:0pt 0pt 12pt;">
<font style=
"margin:0pt 0pt 12pt;font-family:Symbol;border-top:1pt none #D9D9D9;font-size:10pt;;">
·</font></p>
</td>
<td style="width:1pt;">
<p style="width:1pt;width:1pt;font-size:0pt;"></p>
</td>
<td align="left" valign="top">
<p style=
"border-top:1pt none #D9D9D9 ;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;font-size: 10pt;margin:0pt 0pt 12pt;">
<font style="display:inline;color:#000000;">identify available and
suitable retail partners;</font></p>
</td>
</tr>
</table>
</div>
<p style=
"margin:0pt;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;font-size: 10pt;">
</p>
</div>
<div style=
"margin-left:10.2941176470588%;margin-right:10.2941176470588%;">
<div style="width:100%">
<p style=
"margin:24pt 0pt 0pt;text-align:center;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;font-size: 10pt;">

"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;color:#0563C1;">
<font style="display:inline;">37</font></font></p>

</div>
<div style=

<p style=
"margin:0pt 0pt 30pt;color:#0563C1;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;font-size: 10pt;">

<tr>

</td>

<font style=
"margin:0pt 0pt 12pt;font-family:Symbol;border-bottom:1pt none #D9D9D9;font-size:10pt;;">
·</font></p>
</td>
<td style="width:1pt;">
<p style="width:1pt;width:1pt;font-size:0pt;"></p>
</td>

<font style="display:inline;color:#000000;">compete for
sites;</font></p>
</td>
</tr>
</table>
</div>
<div style="width:100%">
<table style="width:100%;" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0">
<tr>
<td style="width:18pt;">

</td>
<td valign="top" align="left" style="width: 17.00pt;">
<p style=
"border-top:1pt none #D9D9D9 ;border-bottom:1pt none #D9D9D9 ;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;font-size: 10pt;margin:0pt 0pt 12pt;">
<font style=
"margin:0pt 0pt 12pt;font-family:Symbol;border-top:1pt none #D9D9D9;border-bottom:1pt none #D9D9D9;font-size:10pt;;">
·</font></p>
</td>
<td style="width:1pt;">
<p style="width:1pt;width:1pt;font-size:0pt;"></p>
</td>
<td align="left" valign="top">
<p style=
"border-top:1pt none #D9D9D9 ;border-bottom:1pt none #D9D9D9 ;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;font-size: 10pt;margin:0pt 0pt 12pt;">
<font style="display:inline;color:#000000;">reach acceptable lease
or host arrangement terms;</font></p>
</td>
</tr>
</table>
</div>
<div style="width:100%">
<table style="width:100%;" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0">
<tr>
<td style="width:18pt;">
<p style="width:18pt;font-size:0pt;"></p>
</td>
<td valign="top" align="left" style="width: 17.00pt;">
<p style=
"border-top:1pt none #D9D9D9 ;border-bottom:1pt none #D9D9D9 ;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;font-size: 10pt;margin:0pt 0pt 12pt;">
<font style=
"margin:0pt 0pt 12pt;font-family:Symbol;border-top:1pt none #D9D9D9;border-bottom:1pt none #D9D9D9;font-size:10pt;;">
·</font></p>
</td>
<td style="width:1pt;">
<p style="width:1pt;width:1pt;font-size:0pt;"></p>
</td>
<td align="left" valign="top">
<p style=
"border-top:1pt none #D9D9D9 ;border-bottom:1pt none #D9D9D9 ;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;font-size: 10pt;margin:0pt 0pt 12pt;">

the skilled veterinarians and skilled employees necessary to staff
the clinics and wellness centers;</font></p>
</td>
</tr>
</table>
</div>
<div style="width:100%">
<table style="width:100%;" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0">
<tr>
<td style="width:18pt;">

</td>

<p style=
"border-top:1pt none #D9D9D9 ;border-bottom:1pt none #D9D9D9 ;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;font-size: 10pt;margin:0pt 0pt 12pt;">
<font style=
"margin:0pt 0pt 12pt;font-family:Symbol;border-top:1pt none #D9D9D9;border-bottom:1pt none #D9D9D9;font-size:10pt;;">
·</font></p>
</td>
<td style="width:1pt;">

</td>
<td align="left" valign="top">
<p style=
"border-top:1pt none #D9D9D9 ;border-bottom:1pt none #D9D9D9 ;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;font-size: 10pt;margin:0pt 0pt 12pt;">
<font style="display:inline;color:#000000;">obtain, in a timely
manner and for an acceptable cost, required licenses, permits, and
regulatory approvals;</font></p>
</td>
</tr>
</table>
</div>
<div style="width:100%">
<table style="width:100%;" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0">
<tr>
<td style="width:18pt;">
<p style="width:18pt;font-size:0pt;"></p>
</td>
<td valign="top" align="left" style="width: 17.00pt;">
<p style=
"border-top:1pt none #D9D9D9 ;border-bottom:1pt none #D9D9D9 ;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;font-size: 10pt;margin:0pt 0pt 12pt;">
<font style=
"margin:0pt 0pt 12pt;font-family:Symbol;border-top:1pt none #D9D9D9;border-bottom:1pt none #D9D9D9;font-size:10pt;;">
·</font></p>
</td>
<td style="width:1pt;">
<p style="width:1pt;width:1pt;font-size:0pt;"></p>
</td>
<td align="left" valign="top">
<p style=
"border-top:1pt none #D9D9D9 ;border-bottom:1pt none #D9D9D9 ;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;font-size: 10pt;margin:0pt 0pt 12pt;">
<font style="display:inline;color:#000000;">respond effectively to
any changes in local, state, and federal law and regulations that
adversely affect our ability to open new wellness centers or
clinics; and</font></p>
</td>
</tr>
</table>
</div>
<div style="width:100%">
<table style="width:100%;" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0">
<tr>
<td style="width:18pt;">
<p style="width:18pt;font-size:0pt;"></p>
</td>
<td valign="top" align="left" style="width: 17.00pt;">
<p style=
"border-top:1pt none #D9D9D9 ;border-bottom:1pt none #D9D9D9 ;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;font-size: 10pt;margin:0pt 0pt 12pt;">
<font style=
"margin:0pt 0pt 12pt;font-family:Symbol;border-top:1pt none #D9D9D9;border-bottom:1pt none #D9D9D9;font-size:10pt;;">
·</font></p>
</td>
<td style="width:1pt;">
<p style="width:1pt;width:1pt;font-size:0pt;"></p>
</td>
<td align="left" valign="top">
<p style=
"border-top:1pt none #D9D9D9 ;border-bottom:1pt none #D9D9D9 ;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;font-size: 10pt;margin:0pt 0pt 12pt;">
<font style="display:inline;color:#000000;">control construction
and other launch costs to open the wellness centers and
clinics.</font></p>
</td>
</tr>
</table>
</div>
<p style=
"margin:0pt 0pt 12pt;border-top:1pt none #D9D9D9 ;border-bottom:1pt none #D9D9D9 ;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;font-size: 10pt;">
<font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;color:#0563C1;">
<font style="display:inline;">There is no guarantee that a
sufficient number of suitable sites or hosts will be available in
desirable areas or on terms that are acceptable to us in order to
achieve our growth plan.&nbsp;&nbsp;If we are unable to open new
clinics and wellness centers, or if openings are significantly
deleyated, our earnings or revenue growth and our business could be
materially and adversely affected, as we expect a portion of our
growth to come from new locations.</font></font></p>
<p style=
"margin:0pt 0pt 12pt;border-top:1pt none #D9D9D9 ;color:#000000;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;font-size: 10pt;">
<font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;color:#0563C1;">
<font style=
"display:inline;color:#000000;background-color: #FFFFFF;">As part
of our longer-term growth strategy, we may enter into geographic
markets in which we have little or no prior operating history. The
challenges of entering new markets include (i)&nbsp;difficulties in
hiring experienced personnel, (ii)&nbsp;unfamiliarity with local
real estate markets and demographics, (iii)&nbsp;consumer
unfamiliarity with our brand, and (iv)&nbsp;competitive and
economic conditions, and discretionary spending patterns that are
different from and more difficult to predict or satisfy than in our
existing markets. Consumer recognition of our brand has been
important for our success in our existing markets. In addition,
clinics and wellness centers that we open in new markets may take
longer to reach expected sales and profit levels on a consistent
basis, and may have higher construction, occupancy, and operating
costs, than clinics and wellness centers that we open in existing
markets, thereby affecting our overall profitability. Any failure
on our part to recognize or respond to these challenges may
adversely affect the success of any new clinics and wellness
centers. Expanding our services segment could require the
implementation, expense, and successful management of enhanced
business support systems, management information systems, and
financial controls, as well as additional staffing, and capital
expenditures and working capital.</font></font></p>
<p style=
"margin:0pt 0pt 12pt;text-align:justify;text-justify:inter-ideograph;color:#000000;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;font-size: 10pt;">
<font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;color:#0563C1;">
<font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;font-weight:bold;color:#000000;">
Failure by us to effectively execute on our rationalization plan
with respect to our Services segment could result in total costs
that are greater than expected or otherwise harm our
business.</font></font></p>
<p style=
"margin:0pt 0pt 12pt;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;font-size: 10pt;">
<font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;color:#0563C1;">
<font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;">In April
2018, as part of the integration of VIP operations, the Company
implemented a rationalization plan with respect to its Services
segment.&nbsp; The plan resulted in the Company discontinuing
underperforming mobile clinics and reducing headcount associated
with those clinics.&nbsp; The Company expects to incur
reorganization expenses related to severance, and contract
termination costs associated with the rationalization primarily
during the second quarter of 2018.&nbsp; Risks associated with this
rationalization plan could include delays in implantation, changes
in plans that increase or decrease the number of employees
affected, adverse effects on employee morale, and increased costs
any of which may impair our ability to achieve anticipated cost
reductions or otherwise harm our business.</font></font></p>
<p style=
"margin:0pt 0pt 12pt;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;font-weight:bold;font-size: 10pt;">
<font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;color:#0563C1;">
<font style="display:inline;">Item&nbsp;2. Unregistered Sales of
Equity Securities and Use of Proceeds</font><font style=
"display:inline;font-weight:normal;">.<a name=
"Item2UnregisteredSalesofEquitySecurities" id=
"Item2UnregisteredSalesofEquitySecurities"></a></font></font></p>
<p style=
"margin:0pt;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;font-size: 10pt;">
<font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;color:#0563C1;">
<font style="display:inline;">None</font></font></p>
<p style=
"margin:0pt;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;font-size: 10pt;">
</p>
<p style=
"margin:0pt;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;font-size: 10pt;">
</p>
</div>
<div style=
"margin-left:10.2941176470588%;margin-right:10.2941176470588%;">
<div style="width:100%">
<p style=
"margin:24pt 0pt 0pt;text-align:center;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;font-size: 10pt;">
<font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;color:#0563C1;">
<font style="display:inline;">38</font></font></p>
</div>

<font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;font-size:6pt;">
&nbsp;</font></p>
</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td valign="top" style="width:50.30pt;padding:0pt 3.6pt;">
<p style=
"margin:0pt 0pt 0pt 12pt;text-indent: -12pt;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;font-size: 10pt;">
<font style=
"display:inline;font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;">101.INS*</font></p>
